Shrine of Oaths.name: 誓言之殿
Shrine of Oaths.description:
誓言之殿是一本融合黑暗奇幻、悬疑解谜与地城探索的基于DND 5 版规则设计的一次性冒险模组，适配 3-4 级角色。该冒险预计 3-4 小时的冒险特别适合钟爱萦绕不散的诡谲氛围与发掘失落史诗的玩家群体。

这座被遗忘的神殿曾是神圣禁地，多年前被永久封印。那些立誓守护此地之人——即便死后依然徘徊的灵体——仍在履行着不朽的守望誓约。

近期一场塌方意外暴露了神殿入口，冒险小队受托寻找埃米尔·科维安爵士，这位受命调查神殿的骑士与其部下已全员失联。当尘封的殿堂重见天日，等待探索者的不仅是古老的秘密，更是对勇气、荣耀乃至命运本身的终极考验。
Shrine of Oaths.caption: 誓言之殿遭遇

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: [[lookup @name uperrcase]] 在物质位面时可以看见身边 60 尺 以太位面的景色，在以太位面时可以看见身边 60 尺内物质位面的景色。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description:
[[lookup @name uperrcase]] 可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到5（1d10）点力场伤害。

[[lookup @name uperrcase]] 可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: [[lookup @name uperrcase]] 可以在物质位面和以太位面之间转换。身处以太边境时，物质位面中也可以看到它，反之亦然。幽魂身处其中某一位面时，无法影响另一位面之物或被另一位面之物影响。

Withering Touch.name: 枯萎触击
Withering Touch.description:
枯萎触击。

近战武器攻击:命中 +5，触及 5 尺 单一目标。命中：>17 (4d6 + 3) 暗蚀伤害。

Horrifying Visage.name: 恐惧面容
Horrifying Visage.description:
幽魂周边60尺内能看见它的非不死生物必须分别进行一次DC 13 的感知豁免，豁免失败者将陷入 1 分钟的恐慌状态。若豁免失败且差值为 5 或更低，则目标还将衰老 1d4×10 年。

该受恐慌目标可以在每个其自身回合结束时重复进行一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止自身的恐慌状态，而该目标也将在未来 24 小时内免疫该幽魂的恐惧面容。该衰老效应产生后的 24 小时内，可用高等复原术抵消。

GM Note：在使用此能力前，请确保所选择的目标都是无相应状态免疫的（即那些尚未在豁免检定中成功通过的生物）。这样做可以避免将效应再次施加给已经具有免疫特性的生物。

Possession.name: 附身
Possession.description:
幽魂身边 5 尺内它可以看见的一名类人生物必须进行一次DC 13 的魅力豁免，豁免失败则被幽魂附身。附身完成后幽魂消失，目标陷入失能且身体失去控制。该幽魂接管目标身体的控制权，但不剥夺目标的意识。

该幽魂此时只能被驱散不死生物类效应指定为目标，其他任何攻击、法术或别的效应都无法将其指定为目标。此时的幽魂保留自己的阵营以及智力、感知、魅力属性，并且免疫魅惑和恐慌，其他资料则与被附身生物相同，但不能获得该目标的知识、职业特性和熟练项。

该身体的生命值降至 0 时，幽魂受驱散或被如驱逐善恶 dispel evil and good 的法术效应迫出来时，附身终止。幽魂自身也可以主动以一个附赠动作终止附身。附身终止时，幽魂重新出现在该身体周边 5 尺内一处未被占据的空间位置。目标在豁免成功或附身终止后的 24 小时里对该幽魂的附身免疫。

Sir Emil Corvian CR1.name: 埃米尔·科维安爵士 CR1
Sir Emil Corvian CR1.description:
埃米尔·科维安爵士语录

职责与荣耀：

  1. “骑士的职责不是追求荣耀，而是守护无辜者于灾厄之前。"

圣武士之道：

  1. "不必做最睿智之人，但求成为危难时最后一个倒下者。"
  2. "若提尔并不垂青于我，那我便以血汗证明之。"

箴言集：

  1. "思虑过甚反成桎梏，持守正道则万事自通。"
  2. "我虽不知万事答案，然明辨是非足矣。"
  3. "察人危难无需聪颖，但凭赤诚足矣。"

Chain Mail.name: 链甲
Chain Mail.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环编成。链甲还包括在甲胄下面穿戴的一层织物衬里，用以阻止擦伤并减缓挥击的冲击。此护甲同时还附有护手。

Longsword.name: 长剑
Longsword.description: 近战攻击检定：命中 +5 ，触及 5 尺，单一目标。命中：8 (1d8 + 3) 挥砍伤害。

Shield.name: 盾牌
Shield.description: 盾牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

Shortbow.name: 短弓
Shortbow.description: 这种双手握持的弓比传统的长弓要小一些，因此非常适合在行进中或骑马时进行快速攻击。

Quiver.name: 箭袋
Quiver.description: 一个箭袋可以装多达 20 支箭。

Arrow.name: 箭矢
Arrow.description: 适用于各种弓箭的标准弹药。这些普通的箭由光滑的木制箭杆、鹅毛箭羽和锤形金属箭头组成。

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: 这是一把中等大小的剑，配有坚固的护手和包裹着皮革的剑柄。这是一件用途广泛的武器，它在灵活性方面弥补了距离方面的不足。

Destabilizator (Rare) v1.name: 崩离战锤（珍稀）v1
Destabilizator (Rare) v1.description:
武器（战锤），珍稀（需同调）

"敌军逼近时，指挥官举起战锤。

'朋友，到此为止了。'他沉声道。

冲锋的敌人被无形的力量震退。

'这...是什么邪术？'入侵者踉跄质问。

'不过是些保持安全距离的小技巧。'指挥官转动锤柄，'我称之为——空间礼貌守则。'"

这把战锤的锤头呈双掌相背的拒止手势，紫晶石在掌心嵌合处流转幽光，每当挥动时都会在空气中留下淡紫色残影。

使用该魔法武器进行的攻击检定与伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

挥动该战锤需要力量属性值不低于 16 点。

崩离猛击（被动能力）。若此锤命中的目标生物体型不超过大型，则其需进行DC 15 的力量豁免检定。若失败，其将被推离 5 尺并受到[[/r 1d8]]的力场伤害；若成功，仅半伤且不移位。

Destabilizator (Uncommon) v1.name: 崩离战锤（非普通）v1
Destabilizator (Uncommon) v1.description:
武器（战锤），珍稀（需同调）

使用该魔法武器进行的攻击检定与伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

崩离猛击（被动能力）。若此锤命中的目标生物体型不超过中型，则其需进行DC 12 的力量豁免检定。若失败，其将被推离 5 尺并受到[[/r 1d4]]的力场伤害；若成功，仅半伤且不移位。

Helm of Open Hand v1.name: 洞明掌盔 v1
Helm of Open Hand v1.description:
奇物（头盔），珍稀（需同调）

"戴上洞明掌盔，对话局势总在意料之外骤变。"

这顶秘银锻造的头盔形似舒展的右掌。

灵掌斥敌。若 5 尺范围内的生物对你进行近战攻击检定，作为一个反应，你可以召唤一个灵体掌，将该生物推离 10 尺。该生物需进行一次 DC15 的力量豁免检定。若失败，则其陷入倒地状态。若成功，该生物会保持站立状态。

此特性一旦使用，在下次长休或短休之前不能再次使用。

Spectral Repulsion.name: 灵掌斥敌
Spectral Repulsion.description:
在攻击之前你被推开了，因此未能命中目标。

此能力适用于 Midi QoL 工作流，并应应用于攻击到“洞明掌盔”佩戴者。

Nux Hemera (Rare) v1.name: 昼夜双生戒（珍稀）v1
Nux Hemera (Rare) v1.description:
奇物，珍稀

“一串由银与金交织而成的戒指。在阳光的恩泽下，治愈的力量悄然涌现，而月光的怀抱中则藏着无尽的奥秘。”

这枚戒指将金银之美熔于一炉，上面錾刻着两位女神侧颜，其形状被设计为象征着太阳和月亮这两颗天体的形象。

此枚戒指有 3 发充能，戒指每日黎明时恢复全部已消耗充能。

作为一个动作消耗 1 发充能，将持戒手的掌心覆于生物体表，为其恢复[[/r 4d4]]点生命值。

日落后，疗效果将逆转为死灵侵蚀：对目标造成[[/r 4d4]]点暗蚀伤害，伤口会浮现银白色月牙形灼痕。

Nux Hemera (Uncommon) v1.name: 昼夜双生戒（非普通）v1
Nux Hemera (Uncommon) v1.description:
奇物，非普通

“一串由银与金交织而成的戒指。在阳光的恩泽下，治愈的力量悄然涌现，而月光的怀抱中则藏着无尽的奥秘。”

这枚戒指将金银之美熔于一炉，上面錾刻着两位女神侧颜，其形状被设计为象征着太阳和月亮这两颗天体的形象。

此枚戒指有 2 发充能，戒指每日黎明时恢复全部已消耗充能。

作为一个动作消耗 1 发充能，将持戒手的掌心覆于生物体表，为其恢复[[/r 2d4]]点生命值。

日落后，疗效果将逆转为死灵侵蚀：对目标造成[[/r 2d4]]点暗蚀伤害，伤口会浮现银白色月牙形灼痕。

Torch.name: 火把
Torch.description: 火把点燃后能够燃烧 1 小时，燃烧期间发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将火把当作简易近战武器，并使用火把发动攻击。命中时，目标受到 1 点火焰伤害。

Mechanics.name: 机制
Mechanics.text:
1. 使用该物品需进行装备与同调。

  2. 在被玩家或NPC装备前，可修改此物品的名称。魔法物品已装备后不建议进行重命名操作。

  3. 在使用反应后，引发近战攻击的指示物的下一次攻击将自动失手。这是通过一个名为“灵掌斥敌”的主动效应来实现的。（仅限 Midi QoL）

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: 难度调整
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
本次遭遇战的战斗难度可动态调整，其具体强度取决于以下因素：玩家角色等级、魔法物品储备、队伍规模、战场环境、敌人数量以及每个敌人的挑战等级。

本冒险模组默认针对 4 名 3-4 级的玩家角色设计，但亦可调整为其他等级。

最简易的难度调节方式是修改怪物的生命值、护甲值或伤害值。

ADVENTURE SUMMARY.name: 冒险总结
ADVENTURE SUMMARY.text:
圣所历史

很久以前，誓言骑士圣所曾是一处礼拜场所，也是骑士与战士们立下誓言的圣地。他们在此宣誓将生命奉献于正义、守护与服务。

当战争召唤他们离去时，骑士们用强大的防护结界封印了圣所，确保其安全直至归来。他们唤醒了先祖之魂代为守护，令这些永恒的护卫看顾神圣殿堂。

然而，战争中无一骑士生还。他们的组织湮灭，圣所也在岁月流逝中被世人遗忘。

近期发现

数代以来，圣所始终掩藏于荒芜废墟之下，未被外界触及。直到部分结构坍塌，一条通往下方密封地穴的通道显露，局面才被打破。

途经的旅人报告称听见远处传来低语，却无人敢踏入其中。

圣所重现的消息引起了"银辉守望者"组织的关注。该组织致力于阻止古老废弃的权能之地释放出超越其墙垣的威胁。

埃米尔·科维安爵士、佩特罗斯·瓦列斯库爵士与扈从格雷戈尔·马洛夫被派往调查这座新现世圣所的异动。作为银辉守望的成员，他们的职责是确保其中遗留之物被遏制或安息。

队伍使命

冒险者们必须从地穴寻路至圣所，并发现银辉守望的骑士们已然殒命——埃米尔·科维安爵士正被守护圣所的远古幽魂附身。

他们需抉择：通过劝说、对抗或驱魔手段解放被附身的骑士，并净化圣所。

SIR EMIL CORVIAN.name: 埃米尔·科维安爵士
SIR EMIL CORVIAN.text:
埃米尔·科维安爵士

护甲等级： 18（锁甲）

生命值： 33（6d8 + 6）

速度： 30尺

属性：

  • 力量： 16（+3）
  • 敏捷： 10（+0）
  • 体质： 13（+1）
  • 智力： 10（+0）
  • 感知： 12（+1）
  • 魅力： 16（+3）

挑战等级： 1（200 XP）

外观： 身着锁甲，佩带长剑与盾牌，披橙色斗篷。

背景： 埃米尔·科维安爵士是银辉守望的骑士，以恪守纪律和虔诚著称。虽受训为战士，仍渴望成为圣武士以济世护民。他力求证明自己配得上神圣使命，期盼终获神启。

动作

  1. 长剑。 近战武器攻击：命中 +5，触及 5 尺，单一目标。命中：8（1d8 + 3）挥砍伤害。

埃米尔·科维安爵士语录

职责与荣耀：

  1. "骑士所求非声名显赫，唯愿以身为盾，守护无辜者于灾厄之前。"

圣武士之道：

  1. "不必做最睿智之人，但求成为危难时最后一个倒下者。"
  2. "若诸神无意择我，我便以血汗铸就神眷之阶。"

箴言集：

  1. "思虑过甚反成桎梏，持守正道则万法自通。"
  2. "我虽不识万象玄机，然明辨是非足矣。"
  3. "察人危难无需聪颖，但凭赤诚足矣。"

ADVENTURE HOOKS.name: 冒险引子
ADVENTURE HOOKS.text:
1. 失踪的调查队

自埃米尔·科维安爵士、骑士佩特罗斯·瓦列斯库与扈从格雷戈尔·马洛夫被派往调查圣所以来，银辉守望者便与他们失去了联系。冒险队伍受命查明他们的下落。

2. 消逝的踪迹

当冒险者在城镇之间行进时，在葱郁密林边缘发现了一处刚刚熄灭的篝火。附近的泥土上有数串脚印，它们在小径汇集后，共同朝着一处几乎看不清的废墟延伸，那里的石质建筑有一半被缠绕的树根和蔓生的植物掩埋了。遗迹看似古老而久被遗忘，但近期活动的痕迹表明此处不久前还有人来过。

THE CRYPT.name: 地穴
THE CRYPT.text:
地穴

描述

通往被遗忘圣所的地下入口由石砌廊道与墓室构成，主体作为安葬之所。石头阶梯向下延伸至中央墓室，墙面排列着棺椁，部分置于小型壁龛中，此处曾是阵亡骑士或英灵的长眠之地。

GM 笔记：

  • 此处 GM 可向玩家分发 @UUID[Item.orrPrIEzwNfj80jy]{火把}。

向北是一条狭窄的走廊，通向另一个墓穴壁龛，而东边的通道则通往一个更大的房间，里面还有更多的石棺。这个房间的北面和南面都有门，南门两侧各有一尊雕像，可能是守护神龛的守护者。房间里摆放着石凳、瓮罐以及一些仪式用品的残余，暗示着过去曾在此为逝者举行过庄重的仪式。

近期活动痕迹

  • 地砖积累的灰尘中，三个靴印在任何光源下都清晰可见。通过 [[/check sur 15]] 检定可辨明靴印是由三位穿重靴者留下。

  • 通过 [[/check inv 12]] 或 [[/check prc 12]] 检定可发现近期燃烧过的火把。

  • 在密闭空间进行 [[/check prc 14]] 检定可察觉木头烧焦的气味。

遭遇与挑战

荣誉试炼

北门上方与石壁融为一体的黯淡铭文需细致观察方能察觉。石门本身是厚重的滑移式石板。

角色需通过 [[/check inv 14]] 或 [[/check prc 12]] 检定以发现铭文。

施展法术侦测魔法显示石门带有预言系的魔法灵光，表明这道石门需要以话语开启而非蛮力。

一旦铭文显现，问题如下：

"骑士面前跪倒降投恶徒，如何处置方为荣耀之道？"

解法：玩家需口头应答符合圣所"荣誉、正义、仁慈"信条之举（如接受投降、公正审判或给予救赎）。符合则门启。

失败： 若提议残暴、复仇或不义之举（如"斩杀"或"刑讯逼供"），或试图 [[/check ath 18]] 强行破门，六具骷髅复苏。

"墓室壁龛的符文骤然燃亮。近乎呢喃的吟诵弥漫于空气之中。长眠者苏醒，将惩处不配踏入圣所之徒。"

GM 笔记：

  • 施展法术敲击术无法开启此门

  • 施展法术解除魔法需进行一次DC 15的施法属性检定

  • 若通过试炼开门，石门将保持开启 10 分钟后闭合

奉献试炼

南门上方镌刻着：

"骑士身负急令途遇伤者，如何处置方为奉献之道？"

解法：玩家需作出彰显利他责任的回应。强调仁爱之心、恪尽职守或将他人福祉置于自身便利之上的回答将被接纳。

失败：若提议弃伤者于不顾、质疑其获助价值或以任务为由拒绝行善，圣所将否决该答案。任何将奉献视为条件交换或利己之举的回应皆被视作不配。

无论如何回答，石门都将开启，未通过试炼或试图 [[/check ath 18]] 强行破门者将被施加诅咒。此后 48 小时内，该角色在进行游说与察觉检定时具有劣势。若试图从圣所带走物品，会听见责备的低语，每件物品造成 [[/r 1d4 psychic]]伤害。

该诅咒可以施展法术解除诅咒进行解除，也可以通过行善举来解除，比如捐赠财富、救助有需要的人或者不求回报地帮助他人。

主持人笔记：

HALL OF OATHS.name: 誓约大厅
HALL OF OATHS.text:
誓言大厅

描述

当冒险者们踏入这个房间时，石门石门轰然闭合并被封堵无法打开。誓言大厅内一片漆黑，没有光源。如果冒险者们携带光源，他们就会发现这是一个巨大的房间，曾经是神殿最神圣的仪式中心。房间内部是一个巨大的穹顶，房间由浮雕石壁、高耸拱顶与入口侧石阶高台构成。

高台中央的阶梯顶端安放着石棺，暗示着这是某位重要人物的安息之所。台阶的左右两侧，呈列阵排布。

在大厅的南北壁龛内存放着更多的石棺，可能是属于该骑士团的高级成员。

在大厅的尽头，数尊定格于痛苦姿态的石像分立两侧。一个身着长袍、散发柔和金光的兜帽雕像的雕像矗立在基座上，一手呈受贡姿态，另一手持石板。

在雕像投下的光亮中，一名骑士的尸体一动不动地躺在地上。看起来似乎已经死了好几天了。

GM 笔记：

  • 这位骑士是佩特罗斯·瓦莱斯库。

一个身着锁甲的人形站在中央石棺旁。他橙色的披风从双肩垂下，目光呆滞，凝视着空无一物之处。

GM 笔记：

  • 这位是被伊里安·瓦尼斯幽魂附体的埃米尔·科维安爵士

在棺材的左侧，一位年轻骑士的尸体躺在石板地上。他身下的血迹已经干涸，看起来似乎已经死了好几天了。

GM Notes:

  • 此为扈从格雷戈尔·马洛夫遗体

接着，毫无征兆地，那身着橙色披风的人动了动。他的姿势微微一变。他举起剑，先是朝向玩家们，然后指向大厅尽头那座发光的雕像。当他开口时，声音沉重而庄重，却又不完全像是正常人的声音。

“你等是否纯洁虔诚到足以进入此地？步入光明，立下誓言。由守护者裁断。”他庄重地命令道。

“倘若贪婪驱使着你等，那么你等将步前人后尘。警谕已示，圣地不容卑劣之徒。"

潜在问答

“你是谁？”
“名字已逝，但职责犹存，至死不渝。圣所长存，我亦如此。”

“这里发生了什么？”
“命运试炼。他们被认定不配。”

“守护者是什么？”
“守护者是裁决。是永不违背的誓言。是神之命运的终考。”

“守护者为谁效力？”
“只为誓言。只为圣所。”

"如何通过试炼？"
“卑劣者索取，高尚者奉献。跪下，言说，接受审判。”

“如果我们拒绝呢？”
 "那么你等前路尽断，圣所自当索取应得之物。"

“为何这座圣所被封印了？”
“那些本应侍奉之人未曾归来，也无人能称得上是忠诚。”

"你正附身这位骑士？"
"这副身躯承载信仰，但疑虑犹存。用杂质锻造的利刃在最终的考验中会折断。"

遭遇与挑战

守护者的审判

若冒险者们检查辉光中的骑士尸体，可发现其手中紧握着一张@UUID[JournalEntry.2LKpe3IBQuLucT3l]{羊皮纸}。

靠近雕像将发现发光石板上@UUID[JournalEntry.79kGY1hMdloavnVU]{铭文}。这些文字是用一种古老但可辨认的字体雕刻而成的。

GM 应让每位玩家大声诵念石板上所写的@UUID[JournalEntry.79kGY1hMdloavnVU]{誓词}根据玩家的表现，GM 应给予所需的 [[/skill religion persuasion 15]] 检定以优势或劣势。如果玩家背诵誓言时充满信念且认真，他们就以优势进行投掷。如果玩家犹豫不决、怀疑或不真诚，他们就以劣势进行投掷。

  • 若全员成功：圣所将被净化，保护结界消失，伊里安·瓦尼斯的幽魂释放埃米尔爵士。

    "职责现已传承于你等。圣所已结净，我终得安息….."

  • 若全员失败：被附身的骑士和骷髅们会转而对玩家怀有敌意。

    "如前人般，警谕已示。接下来就与他们同归沉寂。"

  • 若未全员成功: 守护者的光芒将会增强，且整个房间内的光芒每成功一次就扩大 15 英尺。每失败一次，就会有两具骷髅从墓碑区域出现。被附身的骑士和骷髅们会对失败者产生敌意。

    "诚誓者可前行。余者...自当直面命运。"

GM 笔记：

  • 幽魂与骷髅优先攻击失败玩家，并会一直战斗到失败玩家死亡。若埃米尔·科维安爵士死亡，冒险者们还必须与伊里安·瓦尼斯骑士长的幽魂战斗，此种情况下，GM 应从角色选项卡中将@UUID[Actor.0GgcraJyCKFRr9cC]{幽魂骑士}拖放到地图上。

  • 如果玩家们没有继续背诵《守护者的审判》，而是与除两具尸体之外的任何物品进行互动，那么就视为所有玩家都未能通过《守护者的审判》，战斗将立即开始。

解救埃米尔爵士的方式

情境一：呼唤名讳

如果冒险者们记得伊里安·瓦尼斯的名字（@UUID[JournalEntry.loHH5VaRl3eAkkHl]{来自地穴中的名讳之墙}），他们可以大声念出来以引起幽魂的注意。冒险者们第一次这么做时，埃米尔爵士会犹豫一下，仿佛听到自己的真名让他内心起了反应，使他陷入某种挣扎中。

技能鉴检定:

进行一次 [[/skill religion persuasion 15]] 可迫使幽魂回应。

成功时：

  • 伊里安灵体动摇，注意力转向诵名者。

  • 他的声音在埃米尔爵士急促的呼吸声中回荡，仿佛游离于生者与死者之间。

  • 幽魂终于直接开口说道：

    "为何...呼唤我的名讳？"

  • 玩家可进行劝说/辩论/挑战其附身的正当性。

情境二：神圣驱魔

冒险者可尝试施展驱散亡灵，迫使幽魂减弱对埃米尔爵士的控制。

成功时：

  • 伊里安灵体现形并怒吼，此时他的声音此刻充满愤怒，在大厅里回荡：

    “你竟敢将我驱逐？你以为你的信仰能胜过我的职责？”

  • 埃米尔爵士倒下了，解除附身但陷入力竭状态。

附加后果：

若在审判前触发此事件，四具骷髅将从墓碑区复苏。

INTRODUCTION.name: 简介
INTRODUCTION.text:
p>誓言之殿是一本基于DND 5 版规则设计的一次性冒险模组，适配 3-4 级角色。该冒险预计在 3-4 小时内完成。

故事发生在一座被遗忘的神殿内。

GHOST KNIGHT.name: 幽魂骑士
GHOST KNIGHT.text:
骑士指挥官伊里安·瓦尼斯

护甲等级： 11（天生护甲）

生命值： 44（10d8）

速度： 飞行 40 尺

属性：

  • 力量： 7（-2）
  • 敏捷： 13（+1）
  • 体质： 10（+0）
  • 智力： 10（+0）
  • 感知： 12（+1）
  • 魅力： 17（+3）

感官： 黑暗视觉60尺

伤害免疫： 寒冷、暗蚀、毒素

抗性： 钝击、穿刺、挥砍

状态免疫： 魅惑、力竭、恐慌、擒抱、麻痹、石化、中毒、倒地、束缚

挑战等级： 4（1100 XP）

动作

  1. 枯萎触击。

    近战武器攻击:命中 +5，触及 5 尺 单一目标。命中：>17 (4d6 + 3) 暗蚀伤害。

  2. 附身。幽魂身边 5 尺内它可以看见的一名类人生物必须进行一次DC 13 的魅力豁免，豁免失败则被幽魂附身。附身完成后幽魂消失，目标陷入失能且身体失去控制。该幽魂接管目标身体的控制权，但不剥夺目标的意识。

    该幽魂此时只能被驱散不死生物类效应指定为目标，其他任何攻击、法术或别的效应都无法将其指定为目标。此时的幽魂保留自己的阵营以及智力、感知、魅力属性，并且免疫魅惑和恐慌，其他资料则与被附身生物相同，但不能获得该目标的知识、职业特性和熟练项。

    该身体的生命值降至 0 时，幽魂受驱散或被如驱逐善恶 dispel evil and good 的法术效应迫出来时，附身终止。幽魂自身也可以主动以一个附赠动作终止附身。附身终止时，幽魂重新出现在该身体周边 5 尺内一处未被占据的空间位置。目标在豁免成功或附身终止后的 24 小时里对该幽魂的附身免疫。

特性

  1. 恐惧面容。幽魂周边 60 尺内能看见它的非不死生物必须分别进行一次DC 13 的感知豁免，豁免失败者将陷入 1 分钟的恐慌状态。若豁免失败且差值为 5 或更低，则目标还将衰老 1d4×10 年。

    该受恐慌目标可以在每个其自身回合结束时重复进行一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止自身的恐慌状态，而该目标也将在未来 24 小时内免疫该幽魂的恐惧面容。该衰老效应产生后的 24 小时内，可用高等复原术抵消。

  2. 虚体移动。 幽魂骑士可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

    如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到5（1d10）点力场伤害。

    幽魂骑士可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

  3. 以太视界。幽魂骑士在物质位面时可以看见身边 60 尺 以太位面的景色，在以太位面时可以看见身边 60 尺内物质位面的景色。

  4. 以太化。 幽魂骑士可以在物质位面和以太位面之间转换。身处以太边境时，物质位面中也可以看到它，反之亦然。幽魂身处其中某一位面时，无法影响另一位面之物或被另一位面之物影响。

POST-ENCOUNTER.name: 遭遇战后
POST-ENCOUNTER.text:
若圣所完成净化（通过守护者审判或使用performing the one-hour ritual from the @UUID[JournalEntry.jJ4dnug3cyDs0pRj]{骑士祷文书}进行一小时仪式），誓约大厅尽头的雕像手掌将显现战锤。此外，地穴中的所有门都会解锁。

GM 笔记：

  • 如果使用提供的宏（@UUID[Macro.Z9bJ2ypuOChgtFT6]）来更新光的发散半径，当光的范围达到 75 或更大时，战锤会自动出现。

如果净化未完成，战锤不会出现。不过，冒险者们可以搜查大厅内的棺材，找回曾与阵亡骑士一同埋葬的物品。门仍然紧闭，冒险者们必须通过一次 [[/check ath 18]] 检定来强行打开它们。

如果埃米尔爵士幸存下来，他可能会因自己不够强大而无法抵抗而感到内疚。根据情况，他可能会说以下这些话：

"我...我无法阻止他。他利用我，迫我亲手背弃誓言。"

"你完成了我无法完成的使命，践行了我未尽之责。我欠你一份人情。"

“在此立下的誓言本就不是要永远遵守的。你让他们解脱了。”

“我迷失了多久？我……伤及了多少无辜？”

佩特罗斯...格雷戈尔...我本该护你们周全。"

"他们随我至此，而我却把他们引向了死亡。"

结果与后续

  • 银辉守望者可能给予队伍嘉奖。
  • 圣所遗迹可能吸引学者/祭司前来考据。

Handout: Parchment found on the Fallen K.name: 展示材料：倒下的骑士身上发现的羊皮纸

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
圣所结界永固，我等出征之日即其至洁隐晦之时。归来之勇士们：唯最虔信者诵念守护者石板全文，方可破障复誓。光明涤暗，圣所乃得重归纯粹。

誓言骑士团元老会，圣所最后的守护者

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
几尊古老的陶瓮，蜡封完好且铭刻骑士团纹章。部分已破损的陶瓮内容物散失，少数仍保存完整。

开启陶瓮可见其内盛满骨灰。

Handout: Keeper Tablet Inscription.name: 展示材料：守护者石碑铭文

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
踏上此途，便是立誓。
只取不与，便是背叛。
言而无信，便是亵渎。
唯屈膝虔信者得于荣光中屹立。

愿守护者衡量我心。
愿我言语为人所知。
若我堪任，前路当启，
若我有亏，名讳尽湮。

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:

@UUID[Item.orrPrIEzwNfj80jy]{火把}

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
房间中央的棺椁内安放着骑士遗骸，内有一副锈蚀铠甲及一枚戒指

@UUID[Item.WYE3zmLR2z26dxt6]{昼夜双生戒}

@Embed[Item.WYE3zmLR2z26dxt6 caption=false cite=false]

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
我们曾是这片圣地最后的守护者，受荣誉与誓言的约束，立誓于这些石块之上。我们的使命清晰明确：保护弱者，审判不配之人，保持警惕，守护这片圣地。

但职责并非总在石砌殿堂之内等待。战火降临这片土地，骑士团被召唤出这道围墙。我们无法拒绝这一召唤。

于是，我们封上了大门。我们设下了结界。我们举行了最后的仪式，将必须隐藏的东西封印起来。

我们只留下寂静与石块，相信无人会打扰这片圣地。

尽管我们已走出这道围墙，誓言却并未终结。倘若我们未能归来，知晓这一点。我们的先辈会代我们而立。他们的守望永恒，他们的审判坚定不移。

若你心地纯洁，所为正义，那就向前，接受审判。但若贪婪指引你的道路，若你的灵魂背离了美德，那就回头吧。这里对你而言只有长久坚守誓言的回响。

凭我们的职责与誓言，誓言骑士团，圣地最后的守护者。

Handout: North Coffin Content (Optional).name: 展示材料：北棺内容（可选）

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
房间北面的棺椁内有一顶形状像张开的手掌的奇怪头盔。

@UUID[Item.HBgr238AjrhXMaPR]{洞明掌盔}

@Embed[Item.HBgr238AjrhXMaPR caption=false cite=false]

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
一本曾由圣所入门者诵读的充满誓言和净化仪式的书。

在誓约大厅遭遇战结束后，圣武士或牧师可以从这本册子中选择仪式，施行一小时仪式以净化圣所。

仪式不得被任何人打断或干扰，若骑士长伊里安·瓦尼斯的幽魂仍在场，其会积极阻止玩家进行仪式。

仪式完成后，每个玩家周围的辉光光环会向外扩展 15 尺，这表明圣所已被净化。

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
墙的砖石上刻着一连串的名字，记录着曾在神殿内宣誓效忠的阵亡勇士。许多铭文已模糊不清，难以辨认，但仍有几处依稀可辨。其中有一个名字格外醒目，想必是一位首领：伊里安·瓦恩斯骑士长。

GM 笔记：: 伊里安·瓦尼斯正是附身埃米尔爵士的幽魂本名，现身于誓约大厅。若玩家记诵其名讳，可尝试劝服幽魂释放被附身骑士。

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
一个木箱用铁条加固，岁月已消磨了它不少光泽。锁早已锈坏，轻易就能打开。

Content of the Chest

  • @UUID[JournalEntry.gbJDLHTTjhwGOrrK]{展示材料：羊皮纸}详述了圣所最后的日子。

  • 银质徽章（对学者或骑士组织价值 50 GP）

DESCRIPTION.name: 描述
DESCRIPTION.text:
这个结实的箱子用银色镶嵌物加固，上面刻着骑士团风格的铭文，用的是已失传的方言。锁依然完好无损。

技能检定

  • [[/tool thief 15]] 检定开锁，或 [[/tool str 16]] 检定破拆。

箱内物品

  • 125 SP

  • 密封的暗红色药水瓶（强效治疗药水）

  • @UUID[JournalEntry.jJ4dnug3cyDs0pRj]{展示材料：骑士祷文书}

The Soulbound Knight.name: 魂缚骑士
The Soulbound Knight.description:
该遭遇发生在一座被遗忘的墓穴中——这是个不洁之地，石桥横跨着翻涌迷失灵魂的漩涡。空气中回荡着低语，夹杂着被困者和受诅者的呢喃。魂缚骑士，一位受永恒奴役诅咒的亡灵战士，挥舞着名为"收割者"的长柄刀。他操纵以太能量并驱使受折磨的灵魂守护墓穴及其黑暗秘密。石桥后方耸立着宏伟的陵墓，厚重的石门守卫着不尽秘密。

作为奖励，玩家可获得"收割者"——这把由魂缚骑士使用、灌注以太能量的强力武器。

模组包含日志条目，其中记录了遭遇的所有细节、背景故事与战术信息。
The Soulbound Knight.caption: 魂缚骑士遭遇

Soul Servant CR1/4.name: 灵魂仆从 CR1/4
Soul Servant CR1/4.description: 魂仆是受折磨灵魂的残留，被束缚以侍奉更强大的亡灵主人。它们呈现为小型鬼魅光芒，在空中无声飘荡。其接触可释放强力的电击与暗蚀冲击。

Ethereal Invisibility.name: 以太隐形
Ethereal Invisibility.description: 以太隐形。灵魂仆从处于隐形状态直至其发动一次攻击。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description:
灵魂仆从可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到 [[/roll 1d10]]点力场伤害。

灵魂仆从可以如同穿过困难地形一样穿过其他生物和物件。

Necrotic Shock.name: 暗蚀冲击
Necrotic Shock.description: Necrotic Shock. 近战法术攻击：命中 +4，触及 5 尺，单一目标。命中： [[/roll 1d4]] 点闪电伤害和 [[/roll 1d4]] 点暗蚀伤害。若目标穿戴金属护甲，则其下一次攻击检定或属性检定具有劣势，直至目标下一回合结束。

Soul Rejuvenation.name: 灵魂复生
Soul Rejuvenation.description: 灵魂复生。当灵魂仆从的生命值降为 0 时，魂缚骑士恢复 [[/r 5d8 + 20]] 点生命值。

Soulbound Knight CR4.name: 魂缚骑士 CR4
Soulbound Knight CR4.description:
魂缚骑士语录

战前：

  1. “你闯入了圣地。无人能全身而退。”
  2. “我的灵魂被这悲惨之地束缚。你将与我一同陷入永恒的痛苦。”
  3. “巫妖的意志命令我，我必须服从。准备迎接毁灭吧。”

战斗中：

  1. “你们的命运已定，就像我的一样。”
  2. “你无法逃脱亡者的掌控！”
  3. “见证收割者的力量！”
  4. “这里绝无庇护。”
  5. “停下徒劳的挣扎吧；我的仆从们渴望你的灵魂。”

使用虚幻打击时：

  1. “看啊，生与死之间的领域！”
  2. “感受以太的触碰！”
  3. “你会体验到夹缝中的绝望。”

使用灵魂复生治疗时：

  1. “你的挣扎徒劳无功；我已然重新强大！”
  2. “你越是挣扎，我就越强大！”
  3. “他们的牺牲让我更加强大！”

使用灵魂召唤时：

  1. “当心被遗忘的怨灵！”
  2. “他们的折磨将是你的终结！”
  3. “面对被遗忘灵魂的愤怒！”
  • “被遗忘者的灵魂将是你的最终宿命。”
  • “拥抱前人的绝望吧。”

    • 重伤时：

    1. “黑暗……正收紧它的魔爪。”
    2. “我的末日将至，但你的也不远了！”

    战败时：

    1. “终于……从这折磨中解脱了……”
    2. “诅咒……终于……解除了……”
    3. “在死亡中……我找到了安宁……”

Plate Armor.name: 板甲
Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 魂缚骑士使用其长柄刀”收割者“发动两次近战攻击。

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: 魂缚骑士在物质位面时可以看见身边 60 尺 以太位面的景色，在以太位面时可以看见身边 60 尺内物质位面的景色。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 魂缚骑士对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

The Harvester v1 (Copy).name: 收割者 v1
The Harvester v1 (Copy).description:
武器（长柄刀），珍稀（需同调）

"每次挥斩都如同宣告万物终末的死亡低语"

使用此魔法武器进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰时，你获得 +1 加值。

当魂缚骑士因伤害生命值降低至 0 时，其进行一次体质体质豁免。

LORE.name: 逸闻
LORE.text: 曾经身为英勇圣武士的魂缚者，在一场与邪恶巫妖的激烈战斗中遭遇了悲惨的结局。他被巫妖的黑暗魔法所控制，其堕落的灵魂被囚禁在一套威严的板甲之中，被迫永远守护着巫妖法杖藏匿的那座被遗忘的陵墓。他的武器——一根顶端立着骷髅的长柄刀，刀刃从骷髅中伸出——曾是他自己的头骨，如今却成了他永世奴役的悲剧象征。

BOSS.name: BOSS
BOSS.text:
魂缚骑士

护甲等级： 18（板甲）

生命值： 85（10d8 + 40）

速度： 30 尺

属性：

  • 力量： 18（+4）
  • 敏捷： 11（+0）
  • 体质： 18（+4）
  • 智力： 10（+0）
  • 感知： 12（+1）
  • 魅力： 14（+2）

感官： 黑暗视觉 60 尺

语言： 生前掌握的语言

伤害免疫： 毒素

伤害抗性： 暗蚀，非魔法攻击的钝击、穿刺和挥砍

伤害易伤： 光耀

状态免疫： 魅惑、力竭、恐慌、中毒

挑战等级： 4（1100 XP）

外观： 魂缚骑士是可怖的亡灵战士，生前曾是堕落圣武士。它表现为一套由幽魂能量驱动的威严板甲，旋绕的灵体透过面甲缝隙与关节处隐约可见。

动作

  1. 多重攻击。 魂缚骑士用长柄刀"收割者"发动两次近战攻击。

  2. 武器（长柄刀）收割者能力：

    • 黑暗收割。 收割者攻击命中生物时，额外造成[[/roll 1d4]]点暗蚀伤害。若该生物死亡，你的下一次攻击具有优势。

    • 虚幻打击。 以一个动作，你可以发动一次虚幻打击。以此能力攻击命中一名生物时，目标必须进行一次DC 15 的魅力豁免。豁免失败，目标将陷入以太状态，持续[[/roll 1d4]]轮，存在于物质位面与以太位面边缘的重叠空间，与两界的互动都极为有限。目标可以观察原位面，但是所有事物都以灰度显示，而目标也看不到 60 尺外的东西。目标攻击检定具有劣势，无法穿越实体墙壁，且受到来自两个位面攻击的伤害。持续时间结束后，目标在物质位面重现。一旦使用，该能力在下一次长休前将无法使用。

    • 灵魂收割。以一个动作，你可以旋转收割者释放暗蚀能量爆发，以自身为源点，10 尺范围内的所有生物需进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免。豁免失败者承受[[/roll 1d10]]点挥砍伤害外加[[/roll 1d8]]点暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。一旦使用，该能力在下一次长休前将无法使用。

  3. 灵唤。以一个附赠动作，魂缚骑士可以从迷失灵魂的漩涡中召唤出两名灵魂侍从攻击他的敌人们。

  4. 灵魂献祭。 以一个附赠动作，魂缚骑士可以摧毁其一名灵魂仆从激活灵魂复生。

特质

  1. 强化虚幻打击。若没有目标受到以太状态影响，魂缚骑士可以再次使用虚幻打击。

  2. 强化灵魂收割。此能力在 d6 掷骰中，骰值为 5-6 时恢复充能。

  3. 虚幻召回。以一个附赠动作将收割者从任意位置传送至手中。

  4. 魔法抗性。魂缚骑士对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

  5. 以太视界。魂缚骑士在物质位面时可以看见身边 60 尺以太位面的景色，在以太位面时可以看见身边 60 尺内物质位面的景色。

  6. 魂缚坚韧。当魂缚骑士因非光耀非重击伤害生命值降低至 0 时，其进行一次体质体质豁免（DC为 5 + 所受伤害）。豁免成功则改为将生命值降至 1。

魂缚骑士语录

战前：

  1. “你闯入了圣地。无人能全身而退。”
  2. “我的灵魂被这悲惨之地束缚。你将与我一同陷入永恒的痛苦。”
  3. “巫妖的意志命令我，我必须服从。准备迎接毁灭吧。”

战斗中：

  1. “你们的命运已定，就像我的一样。”
  2. “你无法逃脱亡者的掌控！”
  3. “见证收割者的力量！”
  4. “这里绝无庇护。”
  5. “停下徒劳的挣扎吧；我的仆从们渴望你的灵魂。”

使用虚幻打击时：

  1. “看啊，生与死之间的领域！”
  2. “感受以太的触碰！”
  3. “你会体验到夹缝中的绝望。”

使用灵魂复生治疗时：

  1. “你的挣扎徒劳无功；我已然重新强大！”
  2. “你越是挣扎，我就越强大！”
  3. “他们的牺牲让我更加强大！”

使用灵魂召唤时：

  1. “当心被遗忘的怨灵！”
  2. “他们的折磨将是你的终结！”
  3. “面对被遗忘灵魂的愤怒！”
  1. “被遗忘者的灵魂将是你的最终宿命。”
  2. “拥抱前人的绝望吧。”

重伤时：

  1. “黑暗……正收紧它的魔爪。”
  2. “我的末日将至，但你的也不远了！”

战败时：

  1. “终于……从这折磨中解脱了……”
  2. “诅咒……终于……解除了……”
  3. “在死亡中……我找到了安宁……”

LOCATION.name: 地点
LOCATION.text: 该遭遇发生在一座被遗忘墓穴的广阔厅堂中。其中心处，一座石桥横跨翻涌着迷失灵魂的漩涡，受困者与受诅者的低语声在漩涡中回荡。石桥尽头赫然矗立着一座宏伟陵墓，其巨大的石门在墓室的昏暗中显得格外阴森。

ADVENTURE HOOK.name: 冒险引子
ADVENTURE HOOK.text:
Accidental Discovery. Adventurers stumble upon a forgotten crypt, unaware that it houses the phylactery of a malevolent lich. Trapped inside, they must navigate its dangers to escape while uncovering dark secrets.

Order of Redemption. A paladin order seeks to release a fallen knight from its cursed servitude in a crypt. They recruit adventurers to face undead guardians, confront the knight, and find a way to grant it peace.

The Lich's Legacy. A map uncovered in an ancient library points to a hidden crypt rumored to hold the final resting place of a malevolent lich. Adventurers seek to locate this crypt and claim the dark artifacts and forbidden knowledge said to lie within.

The Ghostly Guardians. Villagers speak of a cursed cemetery where restless spirits roam freely. Adventurers are hired to investigate and lay these spirits to rest, unaware of the necromancer's secret agenda.

Echoes of the Past. Adventurers stumble upon a mysterious journal chronicling a heroic journey to annihilate an ancient evil that threatens the realm. The journal hints at a crypt concealed deep within a forbidding wilderness.

MECHANICS.name: MECHANICS
MECHANICS.text:
1. In this encounter, the Soul Servants are invisible. A player affected by the Phantom Strike's Etherealness will be able to see the invisible souls. To achieve this, open the token configuration, navigate to the Vision tab, go to Detection Modes, and add See Invisibility with a 60 ft range. Remember to delete the See Invisibility Detection Mode when no longer needed!
    Alternatively, you can use the provided macro to add or remove See Invisibility on a selected token.

  2. You can increase the Lightning Darkness Level to at least 0.6 to create a more overwhelming feeling.

Soulbound Knight

  1. Soulbound Fortitude. The GM is responsible for calculating the saving throw DC, rolling, and deciding whether the Knight dies or drops to 1 hit point.

  2. Soul Sacrifice. First, target a Soul Servant token, then use the ability. The ability deals 6 damage and will kill the Soul Servant.

Soul Servant

  1. Necrotic Shock. This ability does not automatically apply disadvantage to targets wearing metal armor. The GM must manage this effect manually.

  2. Soul Rejuvenation. First, target the Soulbound Knight, then use the ability. This ability restores 5d8 + 20 HP to the target.

Macros

@UUID[Macro.fStiChzWvan1bsUs]{Add/Remove 'See Invisibility' on selected Token}

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
The combat difficulty of this encounter can vary and depends on factors such as the level of the player characters, their magic items, the size of the group, the environment, the number of enemies, and the Challenge Rating of each enemy.

Example Encounter Difficulty Estimations for a CR4 Boss:

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 2 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be deadly.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 3 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be deadly.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 4 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be hard.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 5 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be medium.

The easiest way to adjust the difficulty of the encounter is by changing the hit points and armor of the monsters.

Note: If the party has radiant damage, the encounter tends to be easy for the party. To counter that, you can increase the armor or hit points of the Soulbound Knight and Soul Servants.

MINIONS.name: MINIONS
MINIONS.text:
Soul Servants are the remnants of tormented spirits bound to serve more powerful undead masters. They appear as small, ghostly lights that drift silently through the air. Their touch can unleash a powerful electrical and necrotic shock.

SOUL SERVANT

Armor Class: 12 (Natural Armor)

Hit Points: 6 (2d6)

Speed: Fly 30 ft.

Attributes:

  • Strength: 6 (-2)
  • Dexterity: 14 (+2)
  • Constitution: 10 (+0)
  • Intelligence: 5 (-3)
  • Wisdom: 10 (+0)
  • Charisma: 8 (-1)

Senses: Darkvision 60ft

Languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

Damage Immunities: Necrotic, Poison

Damage Resistances: Acid, Cold, Lightning, Thunder, Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from attacks that are not magical

Condition Immunities: Charmed, Grappled, Exhaustion, Paralyzed, Poisoned, Prone, Petrified, Restrained

Challenge: 1/4 (50XP)

Actions

  1. Necrotic Shock. Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/roll 1d4]] lightning damage and [[/roll 1d4]] necrotic damage.

Features

  1. Soul Rejuvenation. When the Soul Servant is reduced to 0 hit points, the Soulbound Knight is healed with [[/r 5d8 + 20]] hit points.

  2. Ethereal Sight. The Soul Servant can see 60ft into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

  3. Incorporeal Movement. The Soul Servant can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes [[/roll 1d10]] force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

  4. Ethereal Invisibility. The Soul Servant is invisible until it makes an attack.

TACTICS.name: TACTICS
TACTICS.text:
• As the players reach the mausoleum stairs, the doors open, and the Soulbound Knight emerges to confront them.

  • The Soulbound Knight prioritizes using Phantom Strike repeatedly until he successfully places a player in an ethereal state.

  • He will use Spirit Call every turn to command two souls from the swirling pool to attack his enemies (add to combat two Soul Servants).

  • If his health is low, he can heal by using Soul Sacrifice on a Soul Servant.

  • The Soulbound Knight uses Soul Reap strategically to target two or more players simultaneously.

Mechanics.name: 机制
Mechanics.text:
1. To use this item, you must equip and attune to it.

  2. Before being equipped to a Player or an NPC, the item's name can be modified. Once it has been equipped, further renaming is not advised. The Activities, Phantom Strike and Soul Reap, should always maintain their original names.

  3. Phantom Strike. If the target fails the saving throw, an Active Effect (AE) named Phantom Strike will be applied to the target. The GM is responsible for rolling and tracking the [[/roll 1d4 ]] rounds for the effect's duration. Once the effect is removed, the associated visual effect will also end.

    You can add See Invisibility to the token if necessary. To do this, open the token configuration, navigate to the Vision tab, go to Detection Modes, and add See Invisibility with a 60 ft range. Remember to delete the See Invisibility Detection Mode when it is no longer needed!
    Alternatively, you can use the provided macro to add or remove See Invisibility on a selected token.

The Giant Abomination.name: The Giant Abomination
The Giant Abomination.description:
In the heart of a frigid wilderness plagued by unnatural cold, the adventurers encounter a desperate villager who narrowly escaped an attack by a horrifying creature. The Giant Abomination, a once proud giant twisted by a terrible curse, now roams the region, driven by an obsessive need to protect a mysterious white dragon egg hidden in its lair. The party’s journey will take them to a shattered boat at a riverside, the site of their first encounter with the creature. Should it escape, the party must pursue it into its dark, icy cavern, where they will face it in a desperate final stand.

The adventurers must uncover the truth behind the curse that created this monstrosity and decide the fate of the egg before the frozen wilderness consumes them.
The Giant Abomination.caption: The Giant Abomination Encounter

Giant Abomination CR4.name: Giant Abomination CR4
Giant Abomination CR4.description:
Giant Abomination Quotes

  1. "The cold is endless... endless like my torment."
  2. "The cold... it calls to me... I must find it."
  3. "You do not understand... I was once mighty... but now I am bound!"
  4. "Do you hear it? The call of the frost... I must answer. You cannot stop it."
  5. "This was never my fate... I was a giant, a protector... now, I am nothing."

Icewalker.name: Icewalker
Icewalker.description: Icewalker. The abomination can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

Frost Explosion.name: Frost Explosion
Frost Explosion.description: Frost Aura. At the start of each of the abomination's turns, each creature within 10ft of it takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

Frost Trail.name: Frost Trail
Frost Trail.description: Frost Trail (Recharge 4–6). The abomination channels its icy power to freeze the ground along a 30ft line that is 5ft wide originating from itself. The frost persists for 1 minute and counts as difficult terrain. Any creature standing in the area when the frost appears must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

Frost Missile.name: Frost Missile
Frost Missile.description:
Frost Missile (Recharge 5–6). The abomination opens its mouth and fires a frost missile at a point it can see within 30ft. The missile explode in a burst of freezing air in a 15ft radius centered on that point.

Creatures in the radius must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The area becomes covered in slick frost for 1 minute, turning it into difficult terrain.

Shiverstrike.description:

Hit: 7 (1d6+ 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

ADVENTURE HOOKS.name: ADVENTURE HOOKS
ADVENTURE HOOKS.text:
As the adventurers trek through the snowy wilderness, they hear crashing footsteps and ragged gasps. A man stumbles into view, soaked to the bone, his hands trembling as he clutches a broken oar.

“Help! It... it destroyed my boat! A monster, it’s searching for something! Please, stop it!”

The man, is a merchant who was ambushed by the creature while navigating the river. He narrowly escaped as the abomination destroyed his boat, muttering about “the relic” and “a memory stolen by the frost.”

MAPS.name: MAPS
MAPS.text:
Snowy River

When the adventurers approach the scene of the wreckage, they see the creature's large, malformed form moves with surprising speed as it rummages through the wreckage. However, it does not immediately notice the adventurers. A Stealth (DC 14) check allows them to observe its frantic searching. It seems to be looking for objects of valor, items it believes are worthy of the dragon egg, as though it is trying to appease the egg or something within it.

If the party’s presence is detected, the Giant Abomination immediately turns to face them.

What... what is this? More treasures... for the egg!

At 20 HP or fewer, the creature flees, retreating toward its cave.

Tactics & Hazzards

The water is considered difficult terrain. Any creature that falls into the river must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw to avoid being swept 10ft downstream.

The abomination uses Frost Trail to create icy patches along the riverbank, forcing creatures into the water.

It begins combat with Frost Missile, targeting groups of enemies.

Abomination Cave

After following the Giant Abomination to its lair, the adventurers find themselves in this icy cavern. The cold is immediately noticeable, and their breath hangs in the air as mist. The darkness is interrupted by a faint glow emanating from deeper inside. The cold light reflects off the icy walls, casting ghostly shadows and faintly illuminating the path forward. Snow crunches beneath their feet as they step into the open central area. The source of the glow becomes clear as the adventurers proceed: the white dragon egg resting in an alcove, glowing faintly.

The Giant Abomination is hunched over a pile of broken wood and debris. Its grotesque form is illuminated faintly by the egg’s glow. He suddenly halts as it senses the adventurers’ approach. With an enraged, guttural cry, it lurches forward, saying:

“You’ve come to steal the treasure! I’ll rip it from your corpses!”

When the Abomination is reduced to half its HP, it retreats to the egg chamber and lets out a desperate, guttural howl:

“No! The treasure must not fall to you! The dragon commands it!”

Tactics & Hazzards

At the start of its turn, the Frost Explosion deals cold damage to all creatures within 10 feet of it.

The Abomination makes two melee attacks with its Shiverstrike, focusing on whoever seems to be carrying the heaviest gear or magical items, as it views these as valuable.

The snowy cavern floor counts as difficult terrain for anyone without cold adaptations.

If more than two party members group together, the Abomination targets them with a Frost Missile.

If cornered, the Abomination creates a 30-foot trail of ice to obstruct the party's movement, retreating toward the dragon egg to make a final stand.

The white dragon egg radiates a magical cold aura within 20ft. Any creature except the Giant Abomination within this radius has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

BOSS.name: BOSS
BOSS.text:
GIANT ABOMINATION

Armor Class: 15 (Natural Armor)

Hit Points: 105 (10d10 + 40)

Speed: 30 ft.

Attributes:

  • Strength: 19 (Proficient +7)
  • Dexterity: 10 (+0)
  • Constitution: 18 (Proficient +7)
  • Intelligence: 6 (-2)
  • Wisdom: 10 (+0)
  • Charisma: 6 (-2)

Senses: Darkvision 60 ft

Languages: Common, Giant

Damage Immunities: Cold, Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing, Exhaustion, Frightened

Vulnerabilities: Fire

Challenge: 7 (2900 XP)

Appearance: Its body is a combination of human-like features and monstrous proportions. One of its hands is large and elongated, capable of crushing anything, while the other is small and deformed. The creature’s movements are jerky, unnatural, and fast.

Actions

  1. Icewalker. The abomination can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

  2. Multiattack. The abomination makes two melee attacks.

  3. Frost Explosion. At the start of each of the abomination's turns, each creature within 10ft of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

  4. Shiverstrike. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target.
    Hit: 14 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

  5. Frost Missile (Recharge 5–6). The abomination opens its mouth and fires a frost missile at a point it can see within 60ft. The missile explode in a burst of freezing air in a 15ft radius centered on that point.

    Creatures in the radius must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The area becomes covered in slick frost for 1 minute, turning it into difficult terrain.

  6. Frost Trail (Recharge 4–6). The abomination channels its icy power to freeze the ground along a 30ft line that is 10ft wide originating from itself. The frost persists for 1 minute and counts as difficult terrain. Any creature standing in the area when the frost appears must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

  7. Frozen Retaliation. When a creature within 10ft of the abomination hits it with a melee attack, the abomination can release a burst of frost. The attacker must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) cold damage and have its speed reduced by 10ft until the end of its next turn.

Giant Abomination Quotes

  1. "The cold is endless... endless like my torment."
  2. "The cold... it calls to me... I must find it."
  3. "You do not understand... I was once mighty... but now I am bound!"
  4. "Do you hear it? The call of the frost... I must answer. You cannot stop it."
  5. "This was never my fate... I was a giant, a protector... now, I am nothing."

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
The combat difficulty of this encounter can vary and depends on factors such as the level of the player characters, their magic items, the size of the group, the environment, the number of enemies, and the Challenge Rating of each enemy.

The encounter is designed for a group of 4 player characters of levels 4 to 7 but can be adjusted for other levels.

The easiest way to adjust the difficulty of the encounters is by changing the hit points, armor or the damage of the monsters.

MECHANICS.name: MECHANICS
MECHANICS.text:
Giant Abomination

  • The abomination abilities (Frost Explosion, Frost Missile, Frost Trail, Frozen Retaliation, and Shiverstrike) can be updated as needed (e.g., changing the ability name, damage, DC, range, etc.).

  • Frost Explosion. The ability should be triggered by the GM at the start of the abomination turn.

  • Frozen Retaliation. GM decide if the ability will be used or not. For example if the abomination it's attacked with a ranged weapon the ability should not be used.

ABOUT BOSS LOOT.name: 关于 BOSS LOOT
ABOUT BOSS LOOT.text:
Hi there, and welcome to Boss Loot One-Shot Adventures module! Thank you for your support!

We're a group of passionate creators who love making awesome magical items and art for Foundry VTT.

For sneak peeks, questions, bugs report join our community discussions on Discord.

With your support, we'll be able to invest more time and resources into Boss Loot, and keep creating new interactive magical items, high-quality artwork, and animations.

Thank you!

POST-ENCOUNTER.name: POST-ENCOUNTER
POST-ENCOUNTER.text:
Once the Giant Abomination is defeated, the adventurers have a chance to investigate the cave, the markings, and the dragon egg. Several possibilities await:
The dragon egg is a powerful magical item. The party can choose to destroy it, or even take the egg with them.
The cave markings reveal that the Giant Abomination was once a powerful giant who was cursed to guard the egg, which may have ties to a long-forgotten prophecy or an ancient pact with dragons. The adventurers may also uncover the journal of the creature's past life, revealing details about its transformation, its madness, and the dragon egg’s history.

  2. Before being equipped to a Player or an NPC, the item's name can be modified. Once it has been equipped, further renaming is not advised.

  3. The item can be customized in terms of damage, range and Dexterity saving throw.

Flame Tyrant.name: Flame Tyrant
Flame Tyrant.description:
Prepare to embark on an immersive encounter for Foundry VTT as you delve into the heart of an active volcanic chamber. Here, amidst the raging fires of the inferno, the party will face the formidable Flame Tyrant and his minions, testing their mettle against the fury of the underworld.

The encounter unfolds within the volatile environment of the volcanic chamber, where rivers of lava and molten rock carve through the cavern floor, creating a perilous landscape that heightens the challenge of your adventure. Engage in a thrilling battle against the powerful Flame Tyrant and his minions, each possessing unique abilities and tactics. This encounter dynamically scales to suit your party's level, ensuring an exhilarating challenge for characters of all abilities.

Experience immersive gameplay with creatures featuring animated tokens, elevating the visual appeal and excitement of the encounter. Victory over the Flame Tyrant yields a rewarding prize: a magic item that the tyrant has equipped, ready to be claimed by your party.
Flame Tyrant.caption: Flame Tyrant Encounter

Death Nova.name: Death Nova
Death Nova.description: Death Nova. When the Flame Elemental dies, it explodes in a burst of fire. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flames Breath.name: Flames Breath
Flames Breath.description: Flames Breath. The Flame Elemental can breath flames to a creature within 5 ft. The creature must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

The Flame Tyrant CR6.name: The Flame Tyrant CR6
The Flame Tyrant CR6.description:
The Flame Tyrant Quotes

  1. "I am the Flame Tyrant, and my rule shall scorch the world's pages with tales of my glory!"

  2. "Fire cleanses, purifies, and destroys. You think yourselves strong enough to command it? Let us test your resolve."

  3. "Extinguish my flames? Foolish mortals. My flames are eternal, as is my dominion over them. You will burn or bow."

  4. "Negotiate? There is but one negotiation: my will or your demise. What could you possibly offer that matches the power of fire?"

  5. "My flames are eternal, my power unyielding. Bow or burn."

  6. "The inferno that courses through me cannot be tamed by mortals. I am a living testament to fire's supremacy."

  7. "Ah, the ants dare to challenge the Flame Tyrant himself. Your defiance shall be a testament to the power of the inferno!"

  8. "Knowledge, you say? Power's true nature lies in wielding it, not in understanding it. But if you seek power, then face me and prove your worth."

Molten Resurgence.name: Molten Resurgence
Molten Resurgence.description: Molten Resurgence (1/Long Rest). As a bonus action, the Flame Tyrant can submerge himself into a pool of lava or magma and regain hit points equal to half of his max current hit point total.

Inferno Wave.name: Inferno Wave
Inferno Wave.description: Inferno Wave (Recharge 5-6). As an action, the Flame Tyrant slams the ground, causing waves of intense heat to ripple outward, igniting the ground with flames that persist for 1 minute. All creatures within a 15-foot radius, as well as any creature that enters the area for the duration, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes vulnerable to fire damage for as long as it remains in the area. A creature that successfully saves is not affected by the vulnerability.

Infernal Explosion.name: Infernal Explosion
Infernal Explosion.description: Infernal Explosion (Recharge 5-6). The Flame Tyrant casts a fireball at a point he can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.description: Pyroblast. As an action, The Flame Tyrant can target a creature within 120ft that it can see. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 fire damage. On a failed save, the target is also set ablaze, taking an additional 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns until it takes an action to extinguish the flames.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.description: Ablaze from Pyroblast, you take an additional 1d4 fire damage at the start of each turn until you take an action to extinguish the flames.

Pyro Head - The Infernal Crown.description:
Wondrous Item, very rare (requires attunement by a fighter, sorcerer, wizard, warlock or rogue)

"There is a fire inside. Watch the flames, the ancient, flickering of the relic's essence and become reborn."

The Infernal Crown, known also as the Pyro Head, is a relic forged in the heart of a extinguished volcano. The helm resembles a skull engulfed in flames.

Ember Gaze. As an action, you can unleash a gaze attack from the Pyro Head. Three rays shoot forth from the helm's eyes and mouth, targeting the nearest three creatures within a 30-foot cone. Each targeted creature must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save, the creature takes 4d6 fire damage. On a successful save, they take half damage. If a creature dies from this attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to the damage the creature took.

This ability can be use twice per long rest.

Inferno Barrier. You are immune to environmental heat damage and resistant to any fire-based attacks or spells.

Intimidating Aura. You gain a +5 bonus to Intimidation checks and a -5 penalty to Persuasion checks.

Curse. When the Infernal Crown is donned, the helm fuses with you, becoming unremovable. During this time, your head takes the appearance of a burning skull, wreathed in fire (the fire is harmless and does not emit heat and light). The helm cannot be removed as long as you live.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
The The Flame Tyrant can take 3 legendary actions. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The {creature} regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

The The Flame Tyrant can take 3 legendary actions.

Lair Actions.name: Lair Actions
Lair Actions.description:
If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair. On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), it can use one of its lair action options. It can't do so while incapacitated or otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can't use one until after its first turn in the combat.

If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair.

Infernal Glide.description: Infernal Glide. The Flame Tyrant can move up to half its speed.

LORE.name: LORE
LORE.text:
It is said that a mage, fascinated by fire and convinced of its potential for ultimate power, embarked on a journey into the heart of an extinguished volcano. Within the depths of the volcano, he discovered a chamber where the boundaries between the material world and the elemental plane of fire were thin, allowing him to harness the purest form of fire magic. Over time, fascination turned to obsession for absolute power, and after extensive experiments with rare materials and ancient incantations, he created the Infernal Crown, awakening the volcano in the process.

Proclaiming himself the Flame Tyrant, he initiated a destructive conquest of the surrounding lands. Villages and towns fell before his advance, consumed by flames. Survivors, terrorized by the flames that devoured everything in their path, fled to neighboring kingdoms, spreading rumors that the volcanic eruption was not a natural occurrence, and that a creature they named "Pyro Head" was responsible for it.

LAIR.name: LAIR
LAIR.text: The encounter takes place in the heart of an active volcanic chamber. The air is stiflingly hot from the river of lava and molten rock that carve the cavern floor.

ADVENTURE HOOKS.name: ADVENTURE HOOKS
ADVENTURE HOOKS.text:
Lost Expedition. The adventurers discover the remains of a previous expedition near the volcano. Among the remnants is a journal detailing their attempt to confront the Flame Tyrant.

Mysterious Fires. Mysterious fires have been erupting in towns and villages across the land, leaving destruction in their wake. The pattern of the fires leads the adventurers to suspect that someone is using fire magic on an unprecedented scale.

Burning Plague. A remote village is suffering from an unexplainable plague that causes the afflicted to spontaneously combust.

Fire Cult Threat. A cult devoted to fire worship has grown in power and influence, seeking to unleash an apocalypse of flames upon the world.

BOSS.name: BOSS
BOSS.text:
THE FLAME TYRANT

Armor Class: 14 (Unarmored)

Hit Points: 119 (14d8 + 56)

Speed: 30 ft.

Attributes:

  • Strength: 10 (+0)
  • Dexterity: 18 (+4)
  • Constitution: 16 (+3)
  • Intelligence: 14 (+2)
  • Wisdom: 12 (+1)
  • Charisma: 18 (+4)

Languages: Abyssal, Common, Ignan

Damage Resistance: Fire

Damage Vulnerabilities: Cold

Condition Immunities: Charmed, Frightened

Challenge: 8 (3,900 XP)

Appearance: The Flame Tyrant stands over 8 feet tall. His eyes gleam like molten gold within his skull-shaped head. He wears a crimson robe and a flowing cape, the color of dried blood, hangs from his shoulders.

Actions

  1. Pyroblast. As an action, The Flame Tyrant can target a creature within 120ft that it can see. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 fire damage. On a failed save, the target is also set ablaze, taking an additional 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns until it takes an action to extinguish the flames.

  2. Infernal Explosion (Recharge 5-6). The Flame Tyrant casts a fireball at a point he can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

  3. Inferno Wave (Recharge 5-6). As an action, the Flame Tyrant slams the ground, causing waves of intense heat to ripple outward, igniting the ground with flames that persist for 1 minute. All creatures within a 15-foot radius, as well as any creature that enters the area for the duration, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes vulnerable to fire damage for as long as it remains in the area. A creature that successfully saves is not affected by the vulnerability.

  4. Flame Shield. As a bonus action, The Flame Tyrant creates a shield of fire around himself. Until the spell ends, any creature within 5 feet that hits him with a melee attack takes 1d8 fire damage.

  5. Molten Resurgence (1/Long Rest). As a bonus action, the Flame Tyrant can submerge himself into a pool of lava or magma and regain hit points equal to half of his max current hit point total.

Legendary Actions

The Flame Tyrant can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Flame Tyrant regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

  1. Infernal Glide. The Flame Tyrant can move up to half its speed.

  2. Pyroblast Retaliation. The Flame Tyrant can cast Pyroblast at a creature he can see.

Legendary Resistances

The Flame Tyrant has 1 legendary resistances. He can choose to succeed on a saving throw he fails.

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing ties), the Flame Tyrant takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

  1. Fire Wall. The Flame Tyrant creates a wall of fire in a 20ft long, 10ft high, and 5ft thick rectangle. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d8 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.

  2. Fire Tornado. The Flame Tyrant creates a tornado of fire in a 20ft radius, 30ft high cylinder centered on a point he can see within range. The inferno whips up the terrain, melting or burning the ground and filling the air with ash and embers. For the next minute, the area within the cylinder becomes difficult terrain.

Tactics

  1. The Flame Tyrant will use his Fire Shield and Infernal Glide to deter close combat and maintain distance from the players.

  2. He will use his helm ability Ember Gaze on wounded enemies.

  3. When engaged in melee he will use Inferno Wave.

  4. He targets players vulnerable to fire with Pyroblast.

  5. He will cast Infernal Explosion, aiming to damage as many players as possible.

  6. When his hit points are halved, he will utilize Molten Resurgence to heal.

The Flame Tyrant Quotes

  1. "I am the Flame Tyrant, and my rule shall scorch the world's pages with tales of my glory!"

  2. "Fire cleanses, purifies, and destroys. You think yourselves strong enough to command it? Let us test your resolve."

  3. "Extinguish my flames? Foolish mortals. My flames are eternal, as is my dominion over them. You will burn or bow."

  4. "Negotiate? There is but one negotiation: my will or your demise. What could you possibly offer that matches the power of fire?"

  5. "My flames are eternal, my power unyielding. Bow or burn."

  6. "The inferno that courses through me cannot be tamed by mortals. I am a living testament to fire's supremacy."

  7. "Ah, the ants dare to challenge the Flame Tyrant himself. Your defiance shall be a testament to the power of the inferno!"

  8. "Knowledge, you say? Power's true nature lies in wielding it, not in understanding it. But if you seek power, then face me and prove your worth."

Appearance. A creature of fire, the Flame Elemental's head resembles a blazing torch. Its wings and limbs twist like tongues of flames. Driven by primal instinct, it roams the deserts and volcanic landscapes, drawn to areas where the flames of the earth burn brightest. Occasionally, it can be bound to the will of more powerful beings.

Actions

  1. Flames Breath. The Flame Elemental can breath flames to a creature within 5 ft. The creature must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

  2. Death Nova. When the Flame Elemental dies, it explodes in a burst of fire. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
The combat difficulty of this encounter can vary and depends on factors such as the level of the player characters, their magic items, the size of the group, the environment, the number of enemies, and the Challenge Rating of each enemy.
You can adjust the difficulty during the encounter by spawning more CR1/2 minions every round.

Example Encounter Difficulty Estimations for CR6 Boss and four Minions with CR of 1/2 each:

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 3 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be deadly.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 4 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be hard.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 5 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be medium.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 6 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be easy.

Example Encounter Difficulty Estimations for CR8 Boss and four Minions with CR of 1/2 each:

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 6 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be deadly.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 8 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be hard.

  • For a group of 4 player characters at level 10 without considering magic items, this encounter is estimated to be medium.

Ogre Hideout.name: 食人魔藏身处
Ogre Hideout.description: 在崎岖的峡谷中，一群冒险者在一处巨大的岩石遮蔽处寻找庇护，却意外发现这里是两个可怕的食人魔兄弟——格罗姆和格拉克的巢穴。这场充满活力的遭遇战中，有动态指示物、技能和魔法物品，营造出一种身临其境且视觉效果引人入胜的体验。格罗姆挥舞着他的魔法大棒“头槌”，而格拉克则用他的带刃皮鞭掌控战场。遮蔽处狭窄的空间加大了挑战难度，食人魔兄弟协同作战，试图压倒冒险者队伍。一旦食人魔被击败，冒险者们就能获得他们的魔法物品，每件物品都有独特的攻击动画和艺术设计。这次遭遇战还附带一份详尽的日志，提供背景故事、战术见解以及所有必要的信息，以确保这是一次刺激且互动性强的冒险。

  2. “想和格罗姆比脑瓜？哈！俺比石头聪明两倍，力气大双倍！"

  3. "格罗姆有大棒槌，大拳头，还有大胃口。你当晚餐味道不错？"

  4. “要啥花里胡哨的法术？俺有棒槌和钢牙！"

  5. "你们别想活着离开这！"

  7. “格拉克抄家伙！让这些小不点知道谁才是老大！"

“传说食人魔酋长伊格·碎骨者拥有钢铁头骨，即便身首异处后，族人仍将其颅骨固定于铁木棒端，包钢头骨铸就了这把致命凶器，让这位暴君死后仍能用他的钢铁脑袋碰碎敌人的骨头脑袋。”

这件武器显现为金属环加固的重木棒，顶端镶嵌着呈咆哮状的食人魔颅骨，骨缝间隐约可见暗红血垢。

完成同调后，持有者获得以下增益：

  • 使用该魔法武器进行攻击检定与伤害掷骰时获得 +1 加值。

  • 对命中的目标造成额外 1d8 钝击伤害

食人魔猛击。当持用者体型至少为大型并使用食人魔头槌时，攻击附加倒地效果。若目标体型不超过大型且造成的伤害不低于其生命值一半，则目标陷入倒地状态。

LOCATION.name: 地点
LOCATION.text: 两个食人魔兄弟的藏身之处是一个巨大的岩石悬垂，位于一个崎岖峡谷的深处。

ADVENTURE HOOK.name: 冒险引子
ADVENTURE HOOK.text:
失踪的商队。 一支贵重商队在穿越峡谷时失踪。商人行会承诺为重金酬谢能找回货物并营救幸存者的人。

肆虐的食人魔。 食人魔一直在附近村庄肆虐——偷窃牲畜、毁坏财产、制造混乱。村民为求安宁向冒险者求助，承诺消灭食人魔威胁者将获得报酬。

风暴避难所。 冒险者在穿越崎岖峡谷时遭遇了暴风雨，在一处巨大岩檐下躲避，却无意间闯入了两头食人魔占据的隐秘巢穴。

MECHANICS.name: 机制
MECHANICS.text:
食人魔

  1. 食人魔凶蛮：此能力将为所有近战攻击额外增加 1d4 点钝击伤害。若要禁用，请从食人魔身上移除此特性。

  2. 拳击和投石：这些能力可进行配置，其伤害值可根据需要进行调整。

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: 难度调整
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
本次遭遇战的战斗难度可动态调整，其具体强度取决于以下因素：玩家角色等级、魔法物品储备、队伍规模、战场环境、敌人数量以及每个敌人的挑战等级。

两个 CR2 大敌的难度示例评估：

  • 对于 4 名等级为 2 级且不考虑魔法物品的玩家角色，这场遭遇战预计难度为高。
  • 对于 4 名等级为 3 级且不考虑魔法物品的玩家角色，这场遭遇战预计难度为中等。
  • 对于 4 名等级为 4 级且不考虑魔法物品的玩家角色，这场遭遇战预计难度为低。

最简易的难度调节方式是修改怪物的生命值、护甲值或伤害值。

TACTICS.name: 战术
TACTICS.text: 格罗姆将会挥舞他的巨棒冲锋、猛击敌人，而格拉克则会使用他的长鞭骚扰并扰乱那些较弱的敌人。

LORE.name: 逸闻
LORE.text: 两个食人魔兄弟，格罗姆和格拉克，在一场暴风雨中，他们在峡谷里偶然发现了一个巨大的岩石遮蔽处。如今，这个隐蔽的藏身处成了他们袭击和恐吓周边地区的窝点。格罗姆挥舞着一根巨棒，此巨棒是用一位传奇食人魔战士的头骨打造而成，这位战士死后，其坚硬的头颅被绑在铁木棍棒的顶端，并用钢条固定。格拉克则使用从他们上次杀掉的冒险者那里夺来的鞭子。

INTRO.name: 简介
INTRO.text:
冒险者从远处听到兄弟俩陷入激烈争吵。他们意识到争论焦点是某件武器。

格罗姆（用拳捶打胸膛）："大棒槌就该归俺！俺更老更大！所以老爹才传它，就像老老爹传给他那样！你现在有鞭子了，少叽歪！"

格拉克（回呛）："破鞭子哪有棒槌好！大棒槌能砸扁东西，能敲碎骨头！鞭子只能抽人嗷嗷叫！"

格罗姆（得意）："不过鞭子吓唬人类挺好使。鞭子一抽他们就鬼哭狼嚎。准是你不会用。"

格拉克（暴躁）："咱会用鞭！咱就想要真家伙，像大棒槌那种。咱想听骨头碎，不想光听人嚎！"

格罗姆（后仰身子，厌烦挥手）："你连棒槌名儿都不知道，蠢蛋小食人魔！族规说最年长的拿祖传大棒槌——俺最老！俺当头儿，头儿说棒槌归俺！有俺在部落才强！敢顶嘴就揍扁你，像老太婆揍你这小崽子时那样！"

格拉克（退后几步，咧嘴狡笑嘟囔）："咱越长越壮实，你越老越不中用，格罗姆。大棒槌迟早归咱... 今天算了，改天吧。到时候咱就用这祖传硬头棒槌揍扁你。"

Volcathar Ascension.name: 伏尔卡萨崛起
Volcathar Ascension.description:
流言正在贸易村落中蔓延，恐惧已深深扎根。人们紧闭门户，只结伴出行——那些胆敢独自外出的人再无音讯。关于夜幕降临时的黑影和一种莫名的恐怖的传言，让村民们心惊胆战。朋友、亲人，甚至路过的旅人，都神秘地消失得无影无踪，随着失踪事件的持续，整个村落笼罩在一片恐慌之中。

隐匿于附近山脉的狂热教派正是失踪案的元凶。在龙吼祭司寇梵领导下，该教派崇拜名为“焚世者伏尔卡萨”的青年红龙。信徒们相信通过崇拜与献祭能将巨龙束缚于其意志之下。但他们不知道，伏尔卡萨只是佯装被控制——他完全清楚信徒的意图。因知晓仪式能助其蜕变为成年巨龙，他默许了教派的存在。一伙冒险者受雇调查失踪事件。他们能否穿越险恶的地形，营救俘虏，并在伏尔卡萨的力量变得不可阻挡之前阻止邪教？

时间在流逝，他们每前进一步，就离那远超想象的巨大危险更近一步。

"凡火岂敢比龙炎"

"凡焰焉能敌龙息"

"凡烬怎堪承龙怒"

这些护腕由一条青年红龙的龙鳞制成。鳞片炽热依旧，但佩戴起来却很舒适。

Volcathar the Flameborn CR 10.name: 焚世者伏尔卡萨 CR10
Volcathar the Flameborn CR 10.description:
焚世者伏尔卡萨语录

仪式遭遇阶段：

  1. "好好铭记此刻的绝望吧，待吾等再次相遇时，尔等面对的将是百倍炽烈的焚天之焰！"

  2. "这就开始畏惧灼热了？真正的炼狱尚未降临！"

  3. "在真正的战斗开始前，吾特许尔等先体验慢火炙烤的乐趣。"

身处巢穴中：

  1. "欢迎来到炼狱——不知诸位是否感受到吾之巢穴的热情款待？"
  2. "尔等脚下的熔岩正在翻涌，那会是你们最后的安息之地。"
  3. "在终结你们可悲的生命之前，吾会让尔等深刻领会何为极致的痛苦。"
  4. "血肉焦香真是令人愉悦——这气息值得细细品味。"

仆从溃败时：

  1. "这些蝼蚁活着时是累赘，死时也不过是助燃的柴薪！"

重伤/防御状态：

  1. "妄以为胜券在握？尔等的得势只不过是一时的虚妄。"

终局宣言：

  1. "百年来烈焰皆臣服于我，纵使焚尽世界，吾亦永为主宰！"
  2. "诸神尚在吾之威压下战栗，区区凡躯也敢僭越？"
  3. "英雄？可笑！尔等的勇气会化作飞灰，野心将成余烬！"

嘲弄讥讽：

  1. “这便是凡人的全力？吾曾烤炙的岩蜥都比尔等顽强！”
  2. “有趣的顽抗...此刻便让尔等知晓，何谓龙怒天威！”

败退时：

  1. "暂且…算你们略胜一筹…"

BOSS.name: BOSS
BOSS.text:
VOLCATHAR THE FLAMEBORN

Armor Class: 18 (Natural Armor)

Hit Points: 203 (17d10 + 85)

Speed: 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

Attributes:

  • Strength: 23 (+6)
  • Dexterity: 10 (+0)
  • Constitution: 21 (+5)
  • Intelligence: 14 (+2)
  • Wisdom: 11 (+0)
  • Charisma: 19 (+4)

Senses: Blindsight 30 ft., Darkvision 120 ft

Languages: Common, Draconic

Damage Immunities: Fire

Challenge: 10 (5900 XP)

Appearance: Volcathar the Flameborn is an imposing dragon with dark red scales and black-edged wings. His powerful tail ends in sharp, jagged spikes.

Actions

  1. Multiattack. The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

  2. Bite. Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

  3. Claw. Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

  4. Fire Breath. The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Volcathar the Flameborn Quotes

During the Ritual Encounter:

  1. "Remember this moment of desperation as you face me again. The flames of our next encounter will be far more intense!"

  2. "What’s the matter? Are you afraid of a little heat?"

  3. "I’m here to make sure you roast slowly before the real battle begins!"

In the Lair:

  1. “Welcome to the inferno! I trust you find my domain… welcoming?”
  2. “The lava beneath your feet will be your grave.”
  3. “You will know the true meaning of suffering before I end your pitiful existence!”
  4. “Ah, the sweet aroma of burning flesh. It is a scent I intend to enjoy thoroughly.”

When Minions are Defeated:

  1. “These weaklings thought they could bring glory to my name. They die as they lived—worthless!”

When Severely Injurend or on the Defense:

  1. “You think you’ve won? I am a dragon! Your victory is but a temporary illusion!”

Before or After the Final Confruntation:

  1. “I have ruled the flames for ages, and I shall continue to do so, even if it means burning the world to cinders!”
  2. “The gods themselves fear my power. What chance do mere mortals have against me?”
  3. “You think yourselves heroes? How laughable. I will turn your valor to ashes and your ambitions to cinders.”

Taunts and Mockery:

  1. "Is that all you've got? I've roasted meat more resilient than your pathetic attempts!"
  2. “Your defiance is amusing. Let me show you why dragons are to be feared!”

When Defeated:

  1. “So, you have bested me... for now.”

CULTISTS.name: 邪教徒
CULTISTS.text:
FATHER KORVAN

Armor Class: 17 (Unarmored Defense)

Hit Points: 97 (15d8 + 30)

Speed: Walk 50 ft

Attributes:

  • Strength: 14 (+2)
  • Dexterity: 18 (+4)
  • Constitution: 14 (+2)
  • Intelligence: 12 (+1)
  • Wisdom: 16 (+3)
  • Charisma: 14 (+2)

Languages: Common, Draconic

Challenge: 5 (1800 XP)

Actions

  1. Unarmed Strike. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Features

  1. Unarmored Defense. While the cultist leader is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

  2. Martial Arts. The cultist leader can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of its Unarmed Strikes. It can roll a d6 in place of the normal damage of its unarmed attack. When it uses the Attack action with an Unarmed Strike on its turn, it can make one Unarmed Strike as a bonus action.

  3. Multiattack. The cultist leader makes three Unarmed Strikes.

  4. Stillness of Mind. The cultist leader can use its action to end one effect on itself that is causing it to be charmed or frightened.

  5. Draconic Command. As an action, once per short rest, the cultist leader channels the power of its draconic patron to inspire and empower its allies. For the next 1 minute, up to 5 allies of the cultist leader within 30ft who can hear it gain Multiattack.

  2. Martial Arts. The masked cultist can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of its Unarmed Strikes. It can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of its Unarmed Strike. When it uses the Attack action with an Unarmed Strike on its turn, it can make one Unarmed Strike as a bonus action.

TACTICS.name: 战术
TACTICS.text:
战术策略

  • 伏尔卡萨：

    • 通过火焰吐息与队伍保持战术距离，优先进行远程压制。仅在建立绝对优势或战场地形有利时发动近战突袭

  • 龙喉祭司寇梵：

    • 使用龙语敕令强化邪教徒的狂热战斗状态
    • 当战局需要武力威慑时，会主动切入战场进行压制

  • 蒙面信徒：

    • 呈现无理智狂热作战状态，绝不撤退，至死方休

ADVENTURE HOOKS.name: 冒险引子
ADVENTURE HOOKS.text: 一个贸易村报告说，有几位居民在神秘的情况下失踪了。冒险者们受雇去调查这些失踪事件。据一名最近逃脱的人质称，他在被押往火山所在的山里途中成功逃走，罪魁祸首是一群戴着面具的邪教徒。他描述这些邪教徒戴着面具，还能从手中生出火焰。冒险者们必须追查这伙邪教徒，揭露他们的阴谋，并在为时已晚之前解救所有人质。

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: 难度调整
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
本次遭遇战的战斗难度可动态调整，其具体强度取决于以下因素：玩家角色等级、魔法物品储备、队伍规模、战场环境、敌人数量以及每个敌人的挑战等级。

本冒险模组默认针对 4 名 9-10 级的玩家角色设计，但亦可调整为其他等级。

最简易的难度调节方式是修改怪物的生命值、护甲值或伤害值。

HAZARDS.name: 危害
HAZARDS.text:
熔岩地形规则（可选）

刚冷却的熔岩（仍炽热）：

  • 刚冷却不久但仍极其炽热的岩浆岩，每回合会对在其上行走的生物造成 1d10 点火焰伤害，这是由于其残留的热量所致。这种岩浆岩表面可以被描述为冒着烟、布满裂缝，裂缝间有余烬在闪烁。

  • 若想给其增添些危险性，行走在其上的生物可进行一次 DC 13 的敏捷豁免检定，以避免踩到特别不稳或温度极高的区域。若豁免失败，则会因踩到一处过热的区域而额外承受 2d10 点火焰伤害，该区域会裂开或喷出蒸汽。

稳定的熔岩 （已冷却，但无危险）：

  • 要是岩浆岩已完全冷却并凝固，那在上面行走就不会有受到伤害的风险。不过，视地形而定，岩石可能会凹凸不平、参差不齐或高低不平，这可能需要敏捷（体操）或力量（运动）检定（DC 10），才能避免跌倒或滑倒，尤其是在奔跑或战斗时。

熔岩交互规则（可选）

接触熔岩（短暂接触）：

  • 如果生物短暂接触熔岩（例如，手或脚擦过熔岩），则会受到 10d10 点火焰伤害。这代表着快速接触熔岩或熔岩被溅到。

坠入熔岩（淹没）：

  • 如果生物掉入岩浆或以其他方式完全被淹没，只要其处于岩浆中，每轮都会受到 18d10 点火焰伤害。这代表着熔岩的高温和破坏力。

站在熔岩附近：

  • 附近熔岩散发的高温也会对那些靠得太近的生物造成伤害。处于熔岩 5 尺范围内的生物，每轮开始时应因极端高温而承受 1d10 点火焰伤害。

BACKGROUND.name: 背景
BACKGROUND.text:
流言正在贸易村落中蔓延，恐惧已深深扎根。人们紧闭门户，只结伴出行——那些胆敢独自外出的人再无音讯。关于夜幕降临时的黑影和一种莫名的恐怖的传言，让村民们心惊胆战。朋友、亲人，甚至路过的旅人，都神秘地消失得无影无踪，随着失踪事件的持续，整个村落笼罩在一片恐慌之中。

隐匿于附近山脉的狂热教派正是失踪案的元凶。在龙吼祭司寇梵领导下，该教派崇拜名为“焚世者伏尔卡萨”的青年红龙。信徒们相信通过崇拜与献祭能将巨龙束缚于其意志之下。但他们不知道，伏尔卡萨只是佯装被控制——他完全清楚信徒的意图。因知晓仪式能助其蜕变为成年巨龙，他默许了教派的存在。

焚躯之誓

该教派最严苛的戒律是“焚躯之誓”，这项誓言禁止使用武器。每位新信徒在教友协助下，必须捕获并献祭类人活物作为入教仪式。信徒坚信真正的力量源于自身，武器是弱者之选，唯有依靠自身力量者才配引导伏尔卡萨的烈焰。他们试图效仿无需凡俗武器便能散播恐惧的巨龙威能。

其战斗风格与仪式实践的核心是“引火护腕”——由伏尔卡萨鳞片打造的魔法物品。信徒立下焚躯之誓后便会获赠此物。他们将护腕迸发的火焰视为巨龙魔力流经自身的证明。

SYNOPSIS.name: 剧情简介
SYNOPSIS.text:
荒原遭遇

朝山脉行进途中，冒险者遭遇邪教徒驱赶人质前往藏身处的队伍。经过武力或交涉后，队伍从邪教徒处获取关键情报：获悉邪教藏匿的巢穴据点，以及正在举行远古仪式的“齿颚崖”。

此刻队伍面临抉择——直捣邪教据点解救更多人质，或急赴齿颚崖中断即将完成的远古仪式。

仪式场地

如果冒险者们决定前往齿颚崖，他们将面临以下两种情境之一。

  1. 情景一：仪式中断

    成功破坏仪式将使伏尔卡萨维持青年龙形态。受仪式反噬的巨龙会短暂交战数回合后撤回巢穴，同时命令邪教徒围剿冒险者。龙喉祭司寇梵仍妄想能控制巨龙，可能会在绝望中逃往巢穴。

    当冒险者们追击至巢穴时，将目睹这般景象：伏尔卡萨正撕咬着最后一名人质泄愤，龙喉祭司寇梵则跪在熔岩池边瑟瑟发抖。发现入侵者的红龙瞳孔骤然收缩，甩尾将龙喉祭司寇梵抽向冒险者，熔岩飞溅中传来震耳欲聋的咆哮：“蝼蚁，用你们的血平息吾之怒火！”
    此刻巨龙因仪式失败陷入虚弱状态，若能用战术诱使其离开岩浆区域，便有机会终结这头青年红龙。

  2. 情景二：仪式完成

    伏尔卡萨将成功蜕变为成年巨龙，但因急速转化陷入虚弱，退守巢穴并驱使邪教徒阻击冒险者。龙喉祭司寇梵亦会伺机逃向巨龙巢穴。

    • 分支 1：寇梵逃脱

      若寇梵脱逃成功，冒险者可尾随其进入龙巢。

      冒险者将偷听到寇梵与巨龙的短暂对峙。彻底陷入癫狂的寇梵仍坚信自己能操控巨龙，而伏尔卡萨戏谑地看着蝼蚁的表演，用龙焰将邪教首领烧成灰烬。

      若重创伏尔卡萨，他将遁入熔岩并发誓复仇，完全蜕变需 1d6 + 6 个月休眠。触动龙巢宝藏将引发洞穴坍塌，冒险者仅有数分钟逃生时间。

    • 分支 2：寇梵伏诛

      若寇梵被截杀于逃亡途中。

      当冒险者们抵达龙巢时，巨龙将保持隐匿状态，直至他们发现其宝藏。一旦宝藏暴露，伏卡萨尔会选择与冒险者交战或尝试谈判。若他选择战斗，其属性与先前阶段相同，但因仪式影响体型有所增大。尽管如此，他仍需 1d6 + 6个月的沉眠来完成最终蜕变。

      若战斗局势恶化且伏卡萨尔身负重伤，他将撤退至熔岩中，发誓将永恒追杀队伍。若玩家试图窃取宝藏，洞窟会剧烈震颤并引发熔岩上涨，他们仅有数分钟时间在龙巢彻底坍塌前逃离。

巨龙巢穴

如果冒险者们直接前往巢穴。

当冒险者们进入龙巢时，会发现巢穴近乎空荡，仅有一名人质被关押。随着深入探索，他们将在“巨廊”中发现壁画，描绘了巨龙通过献祭仪式达成成年期的计划。此时，伏尔卡萨会以成年形态从仪式地点返回巢穴，但仍因仪式消耗处于虚弱状态。它将保留与青年形态完全相同的能力和属性值，并需要 1d6 + 6个月 的沉眠来完成最终蜕变。

巨龙最初会与冒险者们进行数回合交战，但因已达成目的，转而开始谈判。它提出一项交易：若玩家带来试图操控它的邪教徒及其头目寇梵的首级，它将不再袭击邻近村落并长期蛰伏。就在伏尔卡萨提出条件时，寇梵与其邪教徒众抵达龙巢。巨龙随即宣告：

伏尔卡萨："背叛者如期而至。以吾之名惩戒他们，你们的壮举必将得报。"

MAPS.name: 地图
MAPS.text:
荒原遭遇

简介

在翻涌着硫磺雾气的火山焦土上，四名身披熔岩纹章长袍的邪教徒正押解着两名镣铐囚徒。发现冒险者瞬间，邪教徒眼中迸发狂热情绪，挥舞着黑曜石匕首高喊：

邪教徒：“祭品自己送上门了！”

邪教徒：“在焚世者之名的烈焰中化为灰烬吧”

存在幸存邪教徒

冒险者们可以通过一次 DC14 的魅力（游说）检定 获取情报。濒死的邪教徒抽搐着指向天边

邪教徒：“看吧，世界的獠牙正在苏醒。他的真正力量即将降临！寇梵大人会将神明束缚于己愿，而我们也将重生为火焰领主！”

邪教徒（指向另一个方向）：“神明安眠的洞穴。”

邪教徒（临终前喘息着）：“在神的巢穴和火焰吞噬一切的地方，更多的人身陷枷锁。”

没有邪教徒存活

冒险者们可以通过一次 DC 12 的智力（调查）检定 获取情报。他们发现了一些神秘的图画和笔记：

  • 图画： 画面中赤红天空下嶙峋的峭壁，配文为：“烈焰升起之处，便是祂的所在。”

  • 注释： 指巢穴：“在神真正诞生前返回巢穴。被锁链束缚的迷失者必须为最后的牺牲做好准备。”

人质们可能会提到曾听到邪教徒们谈论“唤醒那将吞噬苍穹的火焰”。冒险者们可能会注意到遥远的地平线上有一团奇怪的红光在闪烁。

地图注释

  1. 入口

  2. 邪教徒

齿颚崖

介绍

赤色的火焰漩涡在地图中央剧烈旋转，灼热高温使得任何处于漩涡中心 25 尺范围内的所生物，在其回合开始时需进行一次 DC 14 体质豁免检定，失败则受到 [[/roll 2d6]] 火焰伤害。漩涡外围矗立着二十尺高的嶙峋岩峰，如同巨龙的獠牙。攀爬这些岩峰无需检定，但若试图跳跃跨越，则需进行一次 DC 12 敏捷（体操）检定。

当冒险者抵达时，黑暗仪式已至关键时刻。龙喉祭司寇梵带着五名邪教徒正将人质接连推入火焰漩涡，用鲜活的生命为仪式供能，另有五名邪教徒在旁警戒。年轻红龙伏尔卡萨盘踞在漩涡中央，其龙鳞表面跃动着赤金流火——此刻它正经历着向成年巨龙蜕变的最后阶段。

战术情报

每轮会有 1 名邪教徒将人质投入漩涡（此时 GM 可选择让伏尔卡萨同步喷吐火焰吐息）

累计献祭 3 名人质后仪式完成，伏尔卡萨将蜕变为成年红龙

成年红龙参战后会战斗 1-2 轮，但因蜕变消耗巨大，最终会撤回巢穴休养

冒险者可通过攻击/控制/击杀邪教徒或人质等方式中断仪式。

若仪式失败，伏尔卡萨会强行参战 2 轮，但因仪式未完成而陷入虚弱状态撤回巢穴。

GM 可根据队伍强度，将献祭间隔调整为每 2-3 轮投入 1 名人质以平衡难度。

伏尔卡萨在仪式成功或被中断前无法直接参战。

邪教徒会狂热地专注于献祭仪式，只有直接遭受攻击时才会自卫。

仪式完成后（或被中断后），寇梵会负隅顽抗，但最终会试图逃往巢穴（他坚信自己仍能掌控红龙）。

角色台词

龙喉祭司寇梵 （仪式中）： "见证这簇孕育真神的烈焰！"

龙喉祭司寇梵（仪式中）："伏尔卡萨的升腾已然降临！尔等蝼蚁岂能阻挠焚世者的伟业！"

龙喉祭司寇梵（仪式中）："烈焰吞噬凡躯，巨龙终将苏醒！"

龙喉祭司寇梵 （红龙撤退时）： "愚者！看见了吗？伏尔卡萨终将服从我的意志！通过仪式，焚世者的力量已与我血脉相连！"

龙喉祭司寇梵（红龙撤退时）："尔等以为阻挠升腾仪式就能改写命运？不过是将终焉的丧钟拨慢片刻！"

邪教徒："尔等的死亡将化为吾主登神的柴薪！"

邪教徒："焚世者终将吞噬苍穹！"

邪教徒："又一道灵魂为升腾之火添柴！"

伏尔卡萨 （仪式完成时）："虫豸...尔等有幸见证真正力量的诞生！"

伏尔卡萨 （撤退时）："焚世者终将吞噬苍穹！"

伏尔卡萨 （每当人质被投入漩涡时）："又一道灵魂为升腾之火添柴！"

地图注释

  1. 入口

  2. 烈焰旋涡

  3. 龙吼祭司寇梵

巨龙巢穴

分支路线：跳过仪式场地

当冒险者们闯入巢穴时，发现这里仅剩一名被锁链禁锢的人质。穿过巨廊时，镌刻着古老龙语献祭仪式的壁画若隐若现通过一次 DC 15 的（智力）宗教检定可解读出伏尔卡萨通过血祭加速成长的阴谋）。此时完成部分蜕变的伏尔卡萨会从仪式场地返回巢穴——虽然保持着成年巨龙形态，但因仪式消耗而处于虚弱状态（暂时保留青年龙属性）。它需要 [[/roll 1d6+6]] 个月深度休眠才能完全恢复。

红龙会象征性地与队伍交战数回合，而后突然收拢双翼："蝼蚁们，做个交易如何？把那些妄图操控龙族的邪教徒头颅献上，包括他们那个自命不凡的领袖...作为交换，吾可以承诺百年内不再侵袭村落。" 就在巨龙提出交易之时，寇梵和他的邪教徒们会来到巢穴，这时巨龙会说：

伏尔卡萨："背叛者如期而至。以吾之名惩戒他们，你们的壮举必将得报。"

若接受交易：

  • 冒险者将与寇梵及其麾下的邪教徒交战，巨龙在一旁观战。寇梵被杀死后，伏尔卡萨会遵守约定。他会退回到沉睡中，并要求冒险者们立刻离开，警告他们不要考验他的耐心。

若拒绝交易：

  • 伏尔卡萨会嘲弄地转向寇梵，问他是否求饶，并给他机会杀死所有冒险者。寇梵仍坚信自己能控制伏尔卡萨，于是屈从于这个命令。

在任何情况下，如果沃卡萨的生命值过低，他可能会退入巢穴下方的熔岩中，发誓在完成修养之后回来追杀冒险者们。

倘若玩家试图偷窃伏尔卡萨的秘藏，洞穴将会开始剧烈颤抖，同时岩浆上升。巢穴开始坍塌，冒险者们的逃离时间只有几分钟。

若冒险者破坏了仪式

当冒险者们抵达龙巢时，会发现伏尔卡萨正处于暴怒状态——他正撕咬着最后一名人质的残躯，而寇梵匍匐在地瑟瑟发抖。巨龙察觉到入侵者闯入领地后，龙瞳中迸发出灼热怒焰，当即喝令寇梵剿灭这群不速之客。此刻的付撒卡尔既因仪式被毁实力大损，又因尊严受挫陷入狂躁，正是队伍诛杀这条恶龙的最佳时机。若能通过战术挑衅或环境利用将其诱至露天区域作战，成功率将大大提升。

若冒险者击杀伏尔卡萨与寇梵，可完整夺取龙巢中的巨龙秘藏。

若冒险者未破坏仪式

伏尔卡萨已顺利完成蜕变成为成年巨龙。但仓促的转化过程使其陷入虚弱状态，巨龙撤回巢穴休养，留下邪教徒们与冒险者周旋。如果邪教徒不敌，寇梵会趁机向龙巢方向逃窜。

分支 1：

若龙吼祭司寇梵成功逃脱，且冒险者们追踪至龙巢。

当冒险者们抵达巢穴时，他们将无意中听到寇梵与巨龙之间的短暂对峙：

寇梵： "你已是我的掌中物，伏尔卡萨。仪式既成，你的烈焰将为我所用！"

伏尔卡萨： "愚昧的凡人，妄图束缚焚世之火？你的狂妄蒙蔽了双眼。见证违抗我的代价吧。"

彻底陷入癫狂的寇梵仍坚信自己能操控巨龙，而伏尔卡萨戏谑地看着蝼蚁的表演，用龙焰将邪教首领烧成灰烬。

若冒险者选择与巨龙交战并对其造成重创，伏尔卡萨会潜入熔岩并发誓复仇。

若重创伏尔卡萨，他将遁入熔岩并发誓复仇，完全蜕变需 [[/roll 1d6+6]] 个月休眠。触动龙巢宝藏将引发洞穴坍塌，冒险者仅有数分钟逃生时间。

分支 2：

若寇梵被截杀于逃亡途中。

当冒险者们抵达龙巢时，巨龙将保持隐匿状态，直至他们发现其宝藏。一旦宝藏暴露，伏卡萨尔会选择与冒险者交战或尝试谈判。若他选择战斗，其属性与先前阶段相同，但因仪式影响体型有所增大。尽管如此，他仍需 [[/roll 1d6+6]] 个月的沉眠来完成最终蜕变。

若战斗局势恶化且伏卡萨尔身负重伤，他将撤退至熔岩中，发誓将永恒追杀队伍。若玩家试图窃取宝藏，洞窟会剧烈震颤并引发熔岩上涨，冒险者仅有数分钟逃生时间。

Wrath of the Flameborn.name: 焚世者之怒
Wrath of the Flameborn.description:
伏尔卡萨已彻底成长为成年红龙，并陷入仇恨与复仇的狂暴。冒险者们曾阻挠其仪式的行径必将招致清算。如今，赤色巨影在诸邦肆虐——村庄化作火湖，商队成灰烬，边陲哨所仅余熔融铁骸。零星幸存者颤抖着描述恶龙可怖的焚世者之怒：巨龙总在将受害者焚为焦炭前，逼问某支冒险者小队的踪迹。

昔日蛰伏巢穴的阴影已然褪去，伏尔卡萨展开遮天双翼巡狩天际。当龙焰开始舔舐城墙垛口，恐慌如野火般在城邦间蔓延。诸邦领主向冒险者们下达最终敕令：要么终结这场浩劫，要么背负“引灾入境之罪”被永久驱逐出境。

倒计时的沙漏正在流逝——伏尔卡萨的怒火每分每秒都在膨胀，冒险者们能否在焚世者将珍视的一切化为焦土前，终结这场始于宿怨的焚世者之怒？
Wrath of the Flameborn.caption: 焚世者之怒遭遇

Volcathar the Flameborn CR17.name: 焚世者伏尔卡萨 CR17
Volcathar the Flameborn CR17.description:
伏尔卡萨战吼

城镇广场奇袭：

  1. “凡人，你们以为能逃过我的追猎？这数月来的逃亡，只为此刻的焚烬！”

战术撤退：

  1. “蝼蚁的援军毫无意义...此恨未绝，天涯海角必再诛之！”
  2. “这场猎杀...远未终结！”

焚毁建筑：

  1. “尔等可听见梁柱的哀鸣？且看是屋顶先塌，还是尔等先成焦骨！”

战斗宣言：

  1. “这积郁的怒火...便由尔等血肉浇熄！”

熔岩巢穴：

  1. “熔岩将化作尔等的裹尸布！”
  2. “在赐予解脱之前...定要尔等尝尽炼狱之苦！”
  3. “血肉焦香实乃绝妙...这份愉悦，吾当细细品味”

受伤暴怒：

  1. “垂死挣扎！结局早已注定！”
  2. “痛楚...只会让龙焰愈发炽烈！”

追击宣言：

  1. “逃吧！纵使逃至天涯海角...龙焰终将再临！”

战斗嘲讽：

  1. “这便是凡人的全力？吾曾烤炙的岩蜥都比尔等顽强！”
  2. “有趣的顽抗...此刻便让尔等知晓，何谓龙怒天威！”

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击

Detect.name: 侦查

Legendary Resistance.description: 红龙豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Fly.name: 飞行
Fly.description:
红龙可通过振翼获得 80 尺飞行速度。点击飞行按钮时：若当前处于地面状态将触发起飞动画；若处于空中状态将触发降落动画。

如需通过飞行切换起降动画，请前往设置界面进行配置：Configure Settings -> Boss Loot Automation -> Items/Features -> 禁用「Use Token Elevation for Flying」选项。

红龙拥有 80 尺飞行速度。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
近战攻击检定：+14，触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：15 (2d6 + 8) 挥砍伤害。

成年红龙使用其利爪发动攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战攻击检定：+14，触及 10 尺， 单一目标。命中：19 (2d10 + 8)穿刺伤害。

成年红龙使用其利齿发动攻击。

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
近战攻击检定：+14 命中，, 触及 15 尺， 单一目标。命中：17 (2d8 + 8) 钝击伤害。

成年红龙使用其尾部发动攻击。

Frightful Presence.name: 骇人威仪
Frightful Presence.description:
感知豁免检定：DC 19，红龙 120 尺范围内可意识到其存在的每个生物。失败：目标陷入恐慌状态 1 分钟。陷入恐慌的生物可在其自己回合结束时重复该豁免，成功则终止该效应。成功：该生物在 24 小时内免疫该红龙的骇人威仪。

陷入恐慌的生物在其每个回合中会采取 &Reference[dash] 动作，并沿着最安全的路线远离你，除非无处可逃。如果该生物在其回合结束时处于无法看到你的位置，它将进行一次感知豁免。豁免成功，则法术对该生物的效应结束。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC 21 ，60 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。失败：受到 63 (18d6) 火焰伤害，成功：半伤。

龙在 60 尺锥形区域内喷吐火焰。该区域内的所有生物需进行一次 敏捷豁免检定。

Wing Attack.name: 振翅攻击
Wing Attack.description:
红龙挥动它的翅膀。红龙 10 尺内的每个生物需进行一次DC 22 敏捷豁免检定，失败则受到15（2d6+8）钝击伤害并陷入倒地状态。红龙还可以飞行至多等于其飞行速度一半的距离。

红龙挥动它的翅膀！

Tail Attack.name: 扫尾攻击
Tail Attack.description:
红龙发动一次尾击攻击。

巨龙以粗长的尾部猛力挥扫敌人！

Dragon Fire Horn v2.name: 龙炎号角 v2
Dragon Fire Horn v2.description:
奇物，极珍稀（需同调）

"以龙焰涤净汝等罪孽。"

即使巨龙陨落，这支号角仍会持续燃烧，可作为永不熄灭的火把提供 30 尺明亮光照与额外30尺微光光照。非魔法手段无法熄灭其火焰。

龙焰吐息。 短休后恢复 1 充能，作为一个附赠动作，释放 30 尺锥形烈焰。范围内生物需进行一次DC 16 的敏捷豁免检定。失败：受到 [[/roll 6d6]] 火焰伤害，成功：仅半伤。

DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.name: 难度调整
DIFFICULTY ADJUSTMENTS.text:
本次遭遇战的战斗难度可动态调整，其具体强度取决于以下因素：玩家角色等级、魔法物品储备、队伍规模、战场环境、敌人数量以及每个敌人的挑战等级。

本冒险模组默认针对 4 名 12-15 级的玩家角色设计，但亦可调整为其他等级。

最简易的难度调节方式是修改怪物的生命值、护甲值或伤害值。

BACKGROUND.name: 背景
BACKGROUND.text:
数月前，冒险者们曾试图阻止青年红龙伏尔卡萨完成能使其进化为成年形态的黑暗仪式。尽管仪式中断使伏尔卡萨陷入虚弱，他仍成功逃至巢穴的熔岩洞窟中休养恢复。

如今蜕变为可怖成年红龙的伏尔卡萨已完全掌握成年期的力量，复仇渴望比熔岩更炽烈。被仇恨驱使的巨龙展开双翼，誓要猎杀冒险队伍。他唯一的执念就是将这群人找出来烧成灰烬。

各地开始流传恶龙现世的传闻——目击者称看见燃烧着烈焰的红翼掠过天空，所经之处村庄化作火湖，商队成灰烬，边陲哨所仅余熔融铁骸。零星幸存者颤抖着描述：巨龙总在将受害者焚为焦炭前，逼问某支冒险者小队的踪迹。

BOSS.text:
焚世者伏尔卡萨（成年形态）

护甲等级： 19（天生护甲）

生命值： 300（19d12 + 133）

速度： 40 尺，飞行 80 尺，游泳 40 尺

动作

  1. 多重攻击。 红龙使用骇人威仪，并发动三次攻击：一次啃咬攻击与两次爪击攻击。

  5. 骇人威仪。 感知豁免检定：DC 19，红龙 120 尺范围内可意识到其存在的每个生物。失败：目标陷入恐慌状态 1 分钟。陷入恐慌的生物可在其自己回合结束时重复该豁免，成功则终止该效应。成功：该生物在 24 小时内免疫该红龙的骇人威仪。

  3. 侦查（消耗 1 传奇动作）。 进行一次感知（察觉）检定。

  1. 传奇抗性。 红龙豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

HAZARDS.name: 危害
HAZARDS.text:
熔岩规则（可选）

短暂接触熔岩：

  • 生物肢体短暂接触熔岩（如手脚剐蹭）时，将受到10d10 点火焰伤害。该规则适用于熔岩飞溅或瞬间触碰的时候。

坠入熔岩（完全浸没）：

  • 生物完全坠入熔岩时，每回合承受 18d10 点火焰伤害。此数值对应熔岩高达 2400°F（1316°C）的致命高温。

邻近熔岩灼伤：

  • 距熔岩 5 尺内的生物，在其回合开始时因高热辐射承受1d10 点火焰伤害。处于该区域的金属盔甲会获得法术“灼热金属”效应。

ADVENTURE HOOKS.name: 冒险引子
ADVENTURE HOOKS.text: 一系列聚落、贸易站与边陲哨所已被夷为平地。地方当局发现所有袭击事件均与冒险队伍存在关联——目击者证实恶龙在烈焰焚城前会指名搜寻他们的踪迹。某位担心治所将成为下个目标的地区领主，正勒令队伍立即解决这场危机，否则将以“引灾入境的罪人”之名将其驱逐。

MAPS.name: 地图
MAPS.text:
城镇广场

广场上充斥着市井生活的烟火气，摆满新鲜农产品的摊位与吆喝叫卖的商贩构成日常图景。中央喷泉的潺潺流水声为来往人群提供着宁静氛围——直到灾难毫无预警地降临。

巨大的阴影骤然笼罩广场，困惑抬头的镇民们随即因遮天蔽日的龙翼陷入惊恐。震耳欲聋的咆哮撼动街道，惊飞鸟群、震碎玻璃。民众尖叫逃窜，仓皇逃亡之下满地都是翻倒的货架与被丢弃的商品。

暴怒的伏尔卡萨从云端俯冲而下，双翼掀起的气浪席卷广场。当冒险者们刚意识到危机时，赤红龙焰已从龙颚喷涌而出，瞬间吞噬最近的摊位，将广场化作火海。

血与木的焦糊味弥漫空中。随着轰然巨响，红龙降落在广场中央，燃烧的瞳孔死死锁定冒险者。

“凡人，你们以为能躲过我的追猎吗？此刻，便是尔等化为灰烬之时！”

巨龙战术

高空奇袭： 伏尔卡萨从空中发现冒险队伍后发动突袭，以火焰吐息制造混乱，试图分割团队阵型。

优先打击暴露单位： 首先攻击未处于掩护的目标，并优先解决施法者与治疗者。

焚毁建筑： 若有≥ 2 名冒险者进入建筑躲避，红龙会立即对建筑发动吐息。内部所有单位需进行具有优势的敏捷豁免检定，成功则仅受半伤。该建筑将于 [[/roll 1d4]] 轮后坍塌。

应对城镇守卫： 若城镇守卫开始集结，红龙可能战术性撤退避免被合围。

队伍溃逃反应： 若多数冒险者逃离，伏尔卡萨发出嘲弄：

“逃吧懦夫！纵使躲过今日，吾之龙焰终将再临！”

红龙会目送所有逃跑者散去，并点燃最后一栋建筑后振翼升空，留下化为废墟的城镇广场。

熔岩瀑布

此场景适用于冒险者首次遭遇伏尔卡萨时摧毁其巢穴后。当队伍追踪至红龙巢穴时，会发现漆黑的岩石高台矗立于熔岩河流之中。

巢穴被毁的伏尔卡萨对冒险者的入侵怒火中烧。此处熔岩环绕的孤岩是其最后的堡垒，红龙决心在此死战，誓将仇敌焚作飞灰。在岩浆映照下，巨龙的竖瞳中跳动着歇斯底里的疯狂。

Tower of the Broken Mind.name: Tower of the Broken Mind
Tower of the Broken Mind.description:
A mysterious tower has appeared on the coast, causing violent storms and disrupting the natural order. Within the tower resides the fractured remnants of its creator, the Architect, whose failed experiment shattered his personality into five aspects: the Scholar (logic), the Dreamer (emotion), the Visionary (ambition), the Coward (fear), and the Curious (wonder). Each aspect has its own agenda, shaped by the Architect’s failed experiment to sever an unwanted part of him.

The adventurers must traverse the tower’s levels, solving puzzles, navigating traps, and overcoming challenges, while deciding which aspects to aid and which to exclude from the experiment. Along the way, they uncover the tower’s secrets, including its unstable void-powered magic, its connection to a petrified blue dragon, and the wizard’s struggles with ambition, love, and regret.

The adventure combines exploration, moral dilemmas, and combat, challenging the adventurers to balance logic, emotion, ambition, fear, and curiosity as they unravel the mystery of the tower.
